rdf:Description.dc:title: RDA Expression properties
rdf:Description.skos:note: Properties derived from RDA elements and relationship designators with the domain of RDA Expression.

rdf:Description.reg:name: abridgedAsExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is abridged as (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that shortens the source expression without changing the general meaning or manner of presentation.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that shortens the source expression without changing the general meaning or manner of presentation.
Expression d’une œuvre qui raccourcit l’expression source sans en changer le sens général ou le mode de présentation.
Una expresión de una obra que acorta la entidad fuente sin cambiar el sentido general o la forma de presentación.

rdf:Description.reg:name: abridgementOfExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is abridgement of (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that has been abridged, i.e., shortened without changing the general meaning or manner of presentation of the source work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that has been abridged, i.e., shortened without changing the general meaning or manner of presentation of the source work.
Expression d’une œuvre qui a été abrégée, c’est-à-dire raccourcie sans changer le sens général ou le mode de présentation de l’œuvre source.
Una expresión de una obra que fue abreviada, i.e., acortada sin cambiar el sentido general o la manera de presentación de la obra fuente.

rdf:Description.reg:name: abridger
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has abridger
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a person, family, or corporate body contributing to an expression of a work by shortening or condensing the original work but leaving the nature and content of the original work substantially unchanged.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A person, family, or corporate body contributing to an expression of a work by shortening or condensing the original work but leaving the nature and content of the original work substantially unchanged.

Personne, famille ou collectivité contribuant à une expression d’une œuvre en abrégeant ou en condensant l’œuvre originale tout en conservant la nature et le contenu de l’œuvre originale sensiblement inchangés.
Una persona, familia o entidad corporativa que contribuye a una expresión de una obra acortando o condensando la obra original pero dejando intacta la naturaleza y el contenido de la obra original.

rdf:Description.reg:name: absorbedByExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is absorbed by (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that incorporates another expression.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that incorporates another expression.
Expression d’une œuvre qui intègre une autre expression.
Una expresión de una obra que incorpora otra expresión.

rdf:Description.reg:name: absorbedInPartByExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is absorbed in part by (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that incorporates part of the content of another expression.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that incorporates part of the content of another expression.
Expression d’une œuvre qui intègre une partie du contenu d’une autre expression.
Una expresión de una obra que incorpora parte del contenido de otra expresión.

rdf:Description.reg:name: absorptionInPartOfExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is absorption in part of (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that has been partially incorporated into another expression.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that has been partially incorporated into another expression.
Expression d’une œuvre qui a été partiellement intégrée dans une autre expression.
Una expresión de una obra que se ha incorporado parcialmente en otra expresión.

rdf:Description.reg:name: absorptionOfExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is absorption of (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that has been incorporated into another expression.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that has been incorporated into another expression.
Expression d’une œuvre qui a été intégrée dans une autre expression.
Una expresión de una obra que se ha incorporado en otra expresión.

rdf:Description.reg:name: abstractedAsExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is abstracted as (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that abbreviates the source expression in a brief, objective manner.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that abbreviates the source expression in a brief, objective manner.
Expression d’une œuvre qui abrège l’expression source d’une manière brève et objective.
Una expresión de una obra que abrevia la expresión fuente en una forma breve y objetiva.

rdf:Description.reg:name: abstractedInExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is abstracted in (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work (an abstracting and indexing service) that abstracts the contents of a source expression.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work (an abstracting and indexing service) that abstracts the contents of a source expression.
Expression d’une œuvre (service d’analyse et d’indexation) qui résume le contenu d’une expression source.
Una expresión de una obra (un servicio de indización y resúmenes) que resume el contenido de una expresión fuente.

rdf:Description.reg:name: abstractOfExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is abstract of (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that has been abstracted, i.e., abbreviated in a brief, objective manner.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that has been abstracted, i.e., abbreviated in a brief, objective manner.
Expression d’une œuvre qui a été résumée analytiquement, c’est-à-dire abrégée d’une manière brève et objective.
Una expresión de una obra que fue resumida, i.e., abreviada en una forma breve, objetiva.

rdf:Description.reg:name: abstractsForExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is abstracts for (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work whose contents have been abstracted by an abstracting and indexing service.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work whose contents have been abstracted by an abstracting and indexing service.
Expression d’une œuvre dont le contenu a été résumé par un service d’analyse et d’indexation.
Una expresión de una obra cuyos contenidos han sido resumidos por un servicio de indización y resúmenes.

rdf:Description.reg:name: accessibilityContent
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has accessibility content
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to content that assists those with a sensory impairment in the greater understanding of content which their impairment prevents them fully seeing or hearing.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: Content that assists those with a sensory impairment in the greater understanding of content which their impairment prevents them fully seeing or hearing.
Contenu permettant aux handicapés sensoriels une meilleure compréhension d’un contenu que leur handicap les empêche de voir ou d’entendre parfaitement.
Contenido que ayuda a las personas con discapacidad sensorial para lograr una mayor comprensión de un contenido que su discapacidad les impide oir y ver en forma completa.

rdf:Description.reg:name: accompanyingExpressionRelationship
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has accompanying expression relationship with
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that is an augmentation of, or is augmented by, or is complemented by the expression.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that is an augmentation of, or is augmented by, or is complemented by the expression.
Expression d’une œuvre qui constitue une augmentation de l’expression ou qui est augmentée ou complétée par elle.
Una expresión de una obra que es un aumento de, o se ve aumentada por, o se complementa con la expresión.

rdf:Description.reg:name: actor
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has actor
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a performer contributing to an expression of a work by acting as a cast member or player in a musical or dramatic presentation, etc.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A performer contributing to an expression of a work by acting as a cast member or player in a musical or dramatic presentation, etc.
Interprète contribuant à une expression d’une œuvre en agissant à titre de membre d’une distribution artistique ou de comédien dans une représentation musicale ou dramatique, etc.
Un intérprete que contribuye a una expresión de una obra actuando como un miembro de un reparto o actor en una producción musical o teatral, etc.

rdf:Description.reg:name: adaptationOfExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is adaptation of (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that has been modified for a purpose, use, or medium other than that for which it was originally intended.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that has been modified for a purpose, use, or medium other than that for which it was originally intended.
Expression d’une œuvre qui a été modifiée pour une fin, une utilisation ou un mode d’expression autre que celui auquel elle était destinée à l’origine.
Una expresión de una obra que ha sido modificada para un propósito, uso o medio diferente del previsto originalmente.

rdf:Description.reg:name: adaptedAsChoreographyExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is adapted as choreography (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work consisting of movement (e.g., dance) based on the source work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work consisting of movement (e.g., dance) based on the source work.
Expression d’une œuvre consistant en mouvement (par exemple, de la danse) basée sur l’œuvre source.
Una expresión de una obra que consiste en movimiento (p. ej., danza) basada en la obra fuente.

rdf:Description.reg:name: adaptedAsExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is adapted as (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work based on the source expression.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that modifies the source expression for a purpose, use, or medium other than that for which it was originally intended.
Expression d’une œuvre qui modifie l’expression source pour une fin, une utilisation ou un mode d’expression autre que celui auquel elle était destinée à l’origine.
Una expresión de una obra que modifica la expresión fuente para un propósito, uso o medio diferente del previsto originalmente.

rdf:Description.reg:name: adaptedAsGraphicNovelExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is adapted as graphic novel (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a graphic novel based on the source expression.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A graphic novel based on the source expression.
Roman graphique basé sur l’expression source.
Una novela gráfica basada en la expresión fuente.

rdf:Description.reg:name: adaptedAsLibrettoExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is adapted as libretto (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work consisting of the text of an opera or other work for the musical stage, or an oratorio, based on the source work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that consists of the text of an opera or other work for the musical stage, or an oratorio, based on the source work.
Expression d’une œuvre qui consiste en le texte d’un opéra ou d’une autre œuvre pour la scène musicale, ou bien d’un oratorio, basée sur l’œuvre source.
Una expresión de una obra que consiste en el texto de una ópera u otra obra para representación musical, u oratorio, basada en la obra fuente.

rdf:Description.reg:name: adaptedAsMotionPictureExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is adapted as motion picture (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a motion picture based on the source expression.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A motion picture based on the source expression.
Film basé sur l’expression source.
Una película cinematográfica basada en la expresión fuente.

rdf:Description.reg:name: adaptedAsMotionPictureScreenplayExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is adapted as motion picture screenplay (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work consisting of the screenplay for a motion picture, based on the source work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work consisting of the screenplay for a motion picture, based on the source work.
Expression d’une œuvre consistant en le scénario pour un film, basée sur l’œuvre source.
Una expresión de una obra que consiste en el guión para una película cinematográfica, basado en la obra fuente.

rdf:Description.reg:name: adaptedAsMusicalTheatreExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is adapted as musical theatre (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a musical theatre work based on the source expression.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a musical theatre work based on the source expression.
Expression d’une œuvre de théâtre musical basée sur l’expression source.
Una expresión de una obra de teatro musical basada en la expresión fuente.

rdf:Description.reg:name: adaptedAsNovelExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is adapted as novel (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a novel adapted from the source expression.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a novel adapted from the source expression.
Expression d’un roman adapté de l’expression source.
Una expresión de una novela adaptada de la expresión fuente.

rdf:Description.reg:name: adaptedAsOperaExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is adapted as opera (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of an opera based on the source expression.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of an opera based on the source expression.
Expression d’un opéra basée sur l’expression source.
Una expresión de una ópera basada en la expresión fuente.

rdf:Description.reg:name: adaptedAsOratorioExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is adapted as oratorio (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of an oratorio based on the source expression.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of an oratorio based on the source expression.
Una expresión de un oratorio basada en la expresión fuente.

rdf:Description.reg:name: adaptedAsRadioProgramExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is adapted as radio program (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a radio program based on the source expression.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A radio program based on the source expression.
Émission de radio basée sur l’expression source.
Un programa de radio basado en la expresión fuente.

rdf:Description.reg:name: adaptedAsRadioScriptExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is adapted as radio script (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work consisting of the script for a radio program, based on the source work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work consisting of the script for a radio program, based on the source work.
Expression d’une œuvre consistant en le script d’une émission de radio, basée sur l’œuvre source.
Una expresión de una obra que consiste en el guión de un programa de radio, basado en la obra fuente.

rdf:Description.reg:name: adaptedAsScreenplayExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is adapted as screenplay (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work consisting of the screenplay for a motion picture, television program, or video, based on the source work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work consisting of the screenplay for a motion picture, television program, or video, based on the source work.
Expression d’une œuvre consistant en le scénario pour un film, une émission de télévision ou une vidéo, basée sur l’œuvre source.
Una expresión de una obra que consiste en el guión para una película cinematográfica, programa de televisión o video, basado en la obra fuente.

rdf:Description.reg:name: adaptedAsTelevisionProgramExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is adapted as television program (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a television program based on the source expression.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A television program based on the source expression.
Émission de télévision basée sur l’expression source.
Un programa de televisión basado en la expresión fuente.

rdf:Description.reg:name: adaptedAsTelevisionScreenplayExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is adapted as television screenplay (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work consisting of the screenplay for a television program, based on the source work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work consisting of the screenplay for a television program, based on the source work.
Expression d’une œuvre consistant en le scénario pour une émission de télévision, basée sur l’œuvre source.
Una expresión de una obra que consiste en el guión para un programa de televisión, basado en la obra fuente.

rdf:Description.reg:name: adaptedAsVideoExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is adapted as video (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a video based on the source expression.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A video based on the source expression.
Vidéo basée sur l’expression source.
Un video basado en la expresión fuente.

rdf:Description.reg:name: adaptedAsVideoScreenplayExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is adapted as video screenplay (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work consisting of the screenplay for a video, based on the source work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work consisting of the screenplay for a video, based on the source work.
Expression d’une œuvre consistant en le scénario pour une vidéo, basée sur l’œuvre source.
Una expresión de una obra que consiste en el guión para un video, basado en la obra fuente.

rdf:Description.reg:name: adaptedInVerseAsExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is adapted in verse as (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a literary composition in verse form adapted from the source expression.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a literary composition in verse form adapted from the source expression.
Expression d’une composition littéraire en vers adaptée de l’expression source.
Una expresión de una obra que fue adaptada como una composición literaria en forma de verso.

rdf:Description.reg:name: addendaExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is addenda (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that consists of brief additional material, less extensive than a supplement, but essential to the completeness of the text of the predominant work; it is usually added at the end of the content, but is sometimes issued separately.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that consists of brief additional material, less extensive than a supplement, but essential to the completeness of the text of the predominant work; it is usually added at the end of the content, but is sometimes issued separately.

Expression d’une œuvre qui consiste en brèves informations additionnelles, moins étendues qu’un supplément, mais essentielles à la complétude du texte de l’œuvre prédominante ; ces informations sont généralement ajoutées à la fin du contenu, mais peuvent aussi parfois être publiées séparément.

Una expresión de una obra que consiste en material adicional breve, menos extenso que un suplemento, pero esencial para la integridad del texto de la obra principal; generalmente se añade al final del contenido, pero algunas veces se publica separadamente.

rdf:Description.reg:name: addendaToExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is addenda to (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work to which is added brief additional material, less extensive than a supplement, but essential to the completeness of the content of the work; it is usually added at the end of the content but is sometimes issued separately from it.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work to which is added brief additional material, less extensive than a supplement, but essential to the completeness of the content of the work; it is usually added at the end of the content but is sometimes issued separately from it.

Expression d’une œuvre à laquelle sont ajoutées de brèves informations additionnelles, moins étendues qu’un supplément, mais essentielles à la complétude du contenu de l’œuvre ; ces informations sont généralement ajoutées à la fin du contenu, mais peuvent aussi parfois être publiées séparément.

Una expresión de una obra a la cual es añadido material adicional, menos extenso que un suplemento, pero esencial para la integridad del contenido de la obra; es añadido generalmente al final del contenido pero algunas veces se publica separadamente.

rdf:Description.reg:name: additionalScaleInformation
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has additional scale information
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to supplemental information about scale such as a statement of comparative measurements or limitation of the scale to particular parts of the content of a resource.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: Supplemental information about scale such as a statement of comparative measurements or limitation of the scale to particular parts of the content of a resource.
Information complémentaire relative à l’échelle, comme un relevé de mesures comparatives ou une limitation de l’échelle à certaines portions du contenu.
Información complementaria sobre la escala tal como una mención de medidas comparativas o la limitación de la escala a partes particulares del contenido de un recurso.

rdf:Description.reg:name: analysedInExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is analysed in (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a expression to a work that examines the source expression to identify its components and their relations.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work that examines the source expression to identify its components and their relations.
Expression d’une œuvre qui examine l’expression source pour identifier ses composantes et leurs relations.
Una obra que examina la expresión fuente para identificar sus componentes y sus relaciones.

rdf:Description.reg:name: animator
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has animator
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a person, family, or corporate body contributing to an expression of a moving image work or computer program by giving apparent movement to inanimate objects or drawings.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A person, family, or corporate body contributing to an expression of a moving image work or computer program by giving apparent movement to inanimate objects or drawings.
Personne, famille ou collectivité contribuant à une expression d’une œuvre d’images animées ou d’un programme informatique en donnant l’illusion du mouvement à des objets inanimés ou à des dessins.
Una persona, familia o entidad corporativa que contribuye a una expresión de una obra de imagen en movimiento o un programa de computadora dando movimiento aparente a objetos o dibujos inanimados.

rdf:Description.reg:name: appendixExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is appendix (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that forms an augmenting part of another work which is not essential to the completeness of the content, such as a list of references, statistical tables, and explanatory matter; it can be material which either comes at the end of the content of the predominant work, or is issued separately.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that forms an augmenting part of another work which is not essential to the completeness of the content, such as a list of references, statistical tables, and explanatory matter; it can be material which either comes at the end of the content of the predominant work, or is issued separately.

Expression d’une œuvre qui forme une partie augmentante d’une autre œuvre et qui n’est pas essentielle à la complétude du contenu, telle qu’une liste de références, des tableaux statistiques et des indications explicatives ; elle peut soit figurer à la fin du contenu de l’œuvre prédominante, soit être publiée séparément.

Una expresión de una obra que forma una parte adicional de otra obra y que no es esencial para la integridad del contenido, tal como una lista de referencias, tablas estadísticas y material explicativo; puede ser material que se presenta al final del contenido de la obra principal, o ser publicado separadamente.

rdf:Description.reg:name: appendixToExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is appendix to (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a predominant work that is augmented by another work that consists of material that is not essential to the completeness of the content, such as a list of references, statistical tables, and explanatory matter; the augmenting work can either come at the end of the content, or be issued separately.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a predominant work that is augmented by another work that consists of material that is not essential to the completeness of the content, such as a list of references, statistical tables, and explanatory matter; the augmenting work can either come at the end of the content, or be issued separately.

Expression d’une œuvre prédominante qui est augmentée par une autre œuvre qui consiste en informations qui ne sont pas essentielles à la complétude du contenu, telles qu’une liste de références, des tableaux statistiques et des indications explicatives ; l’œuvre augmentante peut soit figurer à la fin du contenu, soit être publiée séparément.

Una expresión de una obra que es aumentada por otra obra que consiste en material que no es esencial para la integridad del contenido, tal como una lista de referencias, tablas estadísticas, material explicativo; la obra adicional puede venir al final del contenido, o ser publicada separadamente

rdf:Description.reg:name: arrangedAs
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is arranged as
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a musical work that rewrites the source expression for a medium of performance different from that for which the work was originally intended.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a musical work that rewrites the source expression for a medium of performance different from that for which the work was originally intended.
Expression d’une œuvre musicale qui réécrit l’expression source pour une distribution d’exécution différente de celle à laquelle l’œuvre était destinée à l’origine.
Una expresión de una obra que reescribe la expresión fuente para un medio de interpretación diferente de aquel para el cual fue prevista originalmente.

rdf:Description.reg:name: arrangementOf
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is arrangement of
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a musical work that has been rewritten for a medium of performance different from that for which the work was originally intended.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a musical work that has been rewritten for a medium of performance different from that for which the work was originally intended.
Expression d’une œuvre qui a été réécrite pour une distribution d’exécution différente de celle à laquelle l’œuvre était destinée à l’origine.
Una expresión de una obra musical que fue reescrita para un medio de interpretación diferente de aquel para la que fue originalmente prevista.

rdf:Description.reg:name: arrangerOfMusic
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has arranger of music
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a person, family, or corporate body contributing to an expression of a musical work by rewriting the composition for a medium of performance different from that for which the work was originally intended.
rdf:Description.skos:scopeNote: An arranger of music may also modify the work for the same medium of performance, etc., keeping the musical substance of the original composition essentially unchanged.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A person, family, or corporate body contributing to an expression of a musical work by rewriting the composition for a medium of performance different from that for which the work was originally intended.

Personne, famille ou collectivité contribuant à une expression d’une œuvre musicale en réécrivant la composition pour une distribution d’exécution différente de celle à laquelle l’œuvre est originellement destinée.

Una persona, familia o entidad corporativa que contribuye a una expresión de una obra musical reescribiendo la composición para un medio de una interpretación diferente de aquel para el que se habia concebido la obra.

rdf:Description.reg:name: artDirector
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has art director
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a person, family, or corporate body contributing to an expression of a work by overseeing the artists and craftspeople who build the sets for moving image productions.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A person, family, or corporate body contributing to an expression of a work by overseeing the artists and craftspeople who build the sets for moving image productions.
Personne, famille ou collectivité contribuant à une expression d’une œuvre en supervisant les artistes et les artisans qui construisent les décors pour des productions d’images animées.
Una persona, familia o entidad corporativa que contribuye a una expresión de una obra supervisando los artistas y obreros que construyen los platos para producciones de imágenes en movimiento.

rdf:Description.reg:name: aspectRatio
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has aspect ratio
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to the ratio of the width to the height of a moving image.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: The ratio of the width to the height of a moving image.
Le rapport entre la largeur et la hauteur d’une image animée.
La relación de la anchura con la altura de una imagen móvil.

rdf:Description.reg:name: augmentationOfExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is augmentation of (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work whose content is added to by another expression.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work whose content is added to by another expression.
Expression d’une œuvre dont le contenu est accru par une autre expression.
Una expresión de una obra cuyo contenido es añadido por otra expresión.

rdf:Description.reg:name: augmentedByExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is augmented by (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that adds to the content of a predominant expression.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that adds to the content of a predominant expression.
Expression d’une œuvre qui ajoute au contenu d’une expression prédominante.
Una expresión de una obra que añade al contenido de una expresión principal.

rdf:Description.reg:name: award
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has award
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a formal recognition of excellence, etc., given by an award- or prize-granting body, for the content of a resource.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A formal recognition of excellence, etc., given by an award- or prize-granting body, for the content of a resource.
Reconnaissance officielle d’excellence, etc. accordée au contenu d’une ressource par un organisme octroyant une récompense ou un prix.
Un reconocimiento formal de excelencia, etc., otorgado por una entidad que concede premios o reconocimientos, por el contenido de un recurso.

rdf:Description.reg:name: basedOnExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is based on (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression used as the basis for a derivative expression
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression used as the basis for a derivative expression
Expression servant de base à une expression dérivée.
Una expresión utilizada como base para una expresión derivada.

rdf:Description.reg:name: cadenzaComposedForExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is cadenza composed for (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a musical work such as a concerto for which an ornamental passage for a soloist has been composed, either by the same or a different composer.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a musical work such as a concerto for which an ornamental passage for a soloist has been composed, either by the same or a different composer.
Expression d’une œuvre musicale telle qu’un concerto pour laquelle un passage ornemental pour soliste a été composé, soit par le même compositeur, soit par un compositeur différent.
Una expresión de una obra musical tal como un concierto para el cual se ha compuesto un pasaje ornamental para solista, ya sea por el mismo o diferente compositor.

rdf:Description.reg:name: cadenzaExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is cadenza (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a musical work consisting of an ornamental passage for a soloist, added to a musical work such as a concerto, either by the same or a different composer.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a musical work consisting of an ornamental passage for a soloist, added to a musical work such as a concerto, either by the same or a different composer.
Expression d’une œuvre musicale consistant en un passage ornemental pour soliste, ajouté à une œuvre musicale telle qu’un concerto, soit par le même compositeur, soit par un compositeur différent.
Una expresión de una obra musical que consiste en un pasaje ornamental para un solista, añadida a una obra musical como un concierto, por igual o diferente compositor.

rdf:Description.reg:name: cartographerExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has cartographer (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a person, family, or corporate body contributing to an expression of a work by providing additional cartography, or by modifying the previous cartography.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A person, family, or corporate body contributing to an expression of a work by providing additional cartography, or by modifying the previous cartography.
Personne, famille ou collectivité contribuant à une expression d’une œuvre en fournissant une cartographie additionnelle ou en modifiant la cartographie antérieure.
Una persona, familia o entidad corporativa que contribuye a una expresión de una obra proporcionando cartografía adicional o modificando la cartografía anterior.

rdf:Description.reg:name: catalogueExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is catalogue (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that consists of a complete enumeration of items arranged systematically.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that consists of a complete enumeration of items arranged systematically.
Expression d’une œuvre qui consiste en une énumération complète des items classés systématiquement.
Una expresión de una obra que consiste en una enumeración completa de ítems ordenados sistemáticamente.

rdf:Description.reg:name: catalogueOfExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is catalogue of (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work used as the basis for a catalogue, i.e., a complete enumeration of items arranged systematically.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work used as the basis for a catalogue, i.e., a complete enumeration of items arranged systematically.
Expression d’une œuvre servant de base à un catalogue, c’est-à-dire une énumération complète des items classés systématiquement.
Una expresión de una obra utilizada como base para un catálogo, i.e., una enumeración completa de ítems ordenados sistemáticamente.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has censor
rdf:Description.reg:name: censor
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a person, family, or corporate body contributing to an expression of a work by revising the content for the purpose of suppressing parts deemed objectionable on moral, political, military, or other grounds, but leaving the nature and content of the original work substantially unchanged.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A person, family, or corporate body contributing to an expression of a work by revising the content for the purpose of suppressing parts deemed objectionable on moral, political, military, or other grounds, but leaving the nature and content of the original work substantially unchanged. For substantial modifications that result in the creation of a new work, see author at I.2.1.

rdf:Description.reg:name: choralConductor
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has choral conductor
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a conductor contributing to an expression of a musical work by leading a choral performing group in a musical or dramatic presentation, etc.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A conductor contributing to an expression of a musical work by leading a choral performing group in a musical or dramatic presentation, etc.
Un intérprete que contribuye a la expresión de una obra musical dirigiendo un grupo de interpretación coral en una presentación musical o teatral, etc.

rdf:Description.reg:name: choreographerExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has choreographer (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a person, family, or corporate body contributing to an expression of a work by providing additional choreography, or by modifying the previous choreography.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A person, family, or corporate body contributing to an expression of a work by providing additional choreography, or by modifying the previous choreography.
Personne, famille ou collectivité contribuant à une expression d’une œuvre en fournissant une chorégraphie additionnelle ou en modifiant la chorégraphie antérieure.
Una persona, familia o entidad corporativa que contribuye a una expresión de una obra proporcionando coreografía adicional, o modificando la coreografía anterior.

rdf:Description.reg:name: choreographicAdaptationOfExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is choreographic adaptation of (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that has been adapted as a work consisting of movement (e.g., dance).
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that has been adapted as a work consisting of movement (e.g., dance).
Expression d’une œuvre qui a été adaptée en œuvre consistant en mouvement (par exemple, de la danse).
Una expresión de una obra que ha sido adaptada como una obra que consiste en movimiento (p. ej., danza).

rdf:Description.reg:name: choreographyExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is choreography (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that provides the choreography for use in the related expression.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that provides the choreography for use in the related expression.
Expression d’une œuvre qui fournit la chorégraphie destinée à être utilisée dans l’expression en relation.
Una expresión de una obra que proporciona la coreografía para uso en la expresión relacionada.

rdf:Description.reg:name: choreographyForExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is choreography for (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that uses the choreography of the related expression.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that uses the choreography of the related expression.
Expression d’une œuvre qui utilise la chorégraphie de l’expression en relation.
Una expresión de una obra que usa la coreografía de la expresión relacionada.

rdf:Description.reg:name: colourContent
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has colour content
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to the presence of colour, tone, etc., in the content of a resource.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: The presence of colour, tone, etc., in the content of a resource.
La présence de couleur, teinte, etc. dans le contenu d’une ressource.
La presencia de color, tono, etc., en el contenido de un recurso.

rdf:Description.reg:name: colourist
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has colourist
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a person, family, or corporate body contributing to an expression of a work by applying colour to drawings, prints, photographs, maps, moving images, etc.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A person, family, or corporate body contributing to an expression of a work by applying colour to drawings, prints, photographs, maps, moving images, etc.
Una persona, familia o entidad corporativa que contribuye a una expresión de una obra aplicando color a los dibujos, grabados, fotografías, mapas, imágenes en movimiento, etc.

rdf:Description.reg:name: commentaryInExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is commentary in (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a expression to a work that contains a set of explanatory or critical notes on the described expression.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work that contains a set of explanatory or critical notes on the described expression.
Expression d’une œuvre qui contient un ensemble de notes explicatives ou critiques sur l’expression décrite.
Una obra que contiene un conjunto de notas críticas o explicativas de la expresión descrita.

rdf:Description.reg:name: commentator
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has commentator
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a performer contributing to an expression of a work by providing interpretation, analysis, or a discussion of the subject matter on a recording, film, or other audiovisual medium.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A performer contributing to an expression of a work by providing interpretation, analysis, or a discussion of the subject matter on a recording, film, or other audiovisual medium.
Interprète contribuant à une expression d’une œuvre en fournissant une interprétation, une analyse ou une explication du sujet sur un enregistrement, un film ou un autre support audiovisuel.
Un intérprete que contribuye a una expresión de una obra dando una interpretación, análisis, o una discusión del tema en una grabación, película u otro medio audiovisual.

rdf:Description.reg:name: complementedByExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is complemented by (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work paired with another expression without either expression being considered to predominate.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work paired with another expression without either expression being considered to predominate.
Expression d’une œuvre appariée à une autre expression sans qu’aucune des deux expressions ne soit considérée comme prédominante.
Una expresión de una obra unida con otra entidad sin que ninguna pueda ser considerada como principal

rdf:Description.reg:name: composerExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has composer (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a person, family, or corporate body contributing to an expression by adding music to a work that originally lacked it, by composing new music to substitute for the original music, or by composing new music to supplement the existing music.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A person, family, or corporate body contributing to an expression by adding music to a work that originally lacked it, by composing new music to substitute for the original music, or by composing new music to supplement the existing music.

Personne, famille ou collectivité contribuant à une expression en ajoutant de la musique à une œuvre qui n’en avait pas à l’origine, en composant une nouvelle musique pour remplacer la musique originale ou en composant une nouvelle musique pour compléter la musique existante.

Una persona, familia o entidad corporativa que contribuye a una expresión agregando música a una obra que originalmente no tenía, componiendo música nueva para sustituir la música original, o componiendo nueva música para complementar la música existente.

rdf:Description.reg:name: concordanceExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is concordance (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that consists of an index of all the words in the predominant expression.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that consists of an index of all the words in the predominant expression.
Expression d’une œuvre qui consiste en un index de tous les mots de l’expression prédominante.
Una expresión de una obra que consiste en un índice de todas las palabras en la expresión principal.

rdf:Description.reg:name: concordanceToExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is concordance to (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work used as the basis for a concordance, i.e., an index of all the words in the predominant expression.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work used as the basis for a concordance, i.e., an index of all the words in the predominant expression.
Expression d’une œuvre servant de base à une concordance, c’est-à-dire un index de tous les mots de l’expression prédominante.
Una expresión de una obra utilizada como base para una concordancia, i.e., un índice de todas las palabras en la expresión principal.

rdf:Description.reg:name: conductor
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has conductor
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a performer contributing to an expression of a musical work by leading a performing group (orchestra, chorus, opera, etc.) in a musical or dramatic presentation, etc.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A performer contributing to an expression of a musical work by leading a performing group (orchestra, chorus, opera, etc.) in a musical or dramatic presentation, etc.
Interprète contribuant à une expression d’une œuvre musicale en dirigeant un groupe d’interprètes (orchestre, chorale, opéra, etc.) dans une représentation musicale ou dramatique, etc.
Un intérprete que contribuye a una expresión de una obra musical dirigiendo un grupo de interpretación (orquesta, coro, ópera, etc.) en una presentación musical o teatral, etc.

rdf:Description.reg:name: containedInExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is contained in (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a larger work of which the expression is a discrete component.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a larger work of which the expression is a discrete component.
Expression d’une œuvre plus vaste dont l’expression est une composante distincte.
Una expresión de una obra mayor de la cual una parte es un componente separado.

rdf:Description.reg:name: containerOfExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is container of (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that is a discrete component of a larger expression.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that is a discrete component of a larger expression.
Expression d’une œuvre qui est une composante distincte d’une expression plus vaste.
Una expresión de una obra que es un componente separado de una expresión mayor.

rdf:Description.reg:name: contentType
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has content type
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a categorization reflecting the fundamental form of communication in which the content is expressed and the human sense through which it is intended to be perceived.
rdf:Description.skos:scopeNote: For content expressed in the form of an image or images, content type also reflects the number of spatial dimensions in which the content is intended to be perceived and the perceived presence or absence of movement.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A categorization reflecting the fundamental form of communication in which the content is expressed and the human sense through which it is intended to be perceived.
Catégorisation reflétant la forme fondamentale de communication sous laquelle le contenu est exprimé et le sens humain par lequel il doit être perçu.
Una categorización que refleja la forma fundamental de comunicación en la cual se expresa el contenido y el sentido humano a través por el se espera sea percibido.

rdf:Description.reg:name: continuationInPartOfExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is continuation in part of (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that split into two or more separate expressions with new titles.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that split into two or more separate expressions with new titles.
Expression d’une œuvre qui s’est scindée en deux ou plusieurs expressions distinctes avec de nouveaux titres.
Una expresión de una obra que se divide en dos o más entidades separadas con nuevos títulos.

rdf:Description.reg:name: continuationOfExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is continuation of (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that is continued by the content of an expression of a later work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that is continued by the content of an expression of a later work.
Expression d’une œuvre qui est continuée par le contenu d’une expression d’une œuvre ultérieure.
Una expresión de una obra que es continuada por el contenido de una expresión de una obra posterior.

rdf:Description.reg:name: continuedByExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is continued by (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work whose content continues an expression of an earlier work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work whose content continues an expression of an earlier work.
Expression d’une œuvre dont le contenu continue une expression d’une œuvre antérieure.
Una expresión de una obra cuyo contenido continúa una entidad anterior bajo un título nuevo.

rdf:Description.reg:name: continuedInPartByExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is continued in part by (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work part of whose content separated from an earlier expression to form a new expression.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work part of whose content separated from an earlier expression to form a new expression.
Expression d’une œuvre dont une partie du contenu a été détachée d’une expression antérieure pour former une nouvelle expression.
Una expresión de una obra parte de cuyo contenido se separó de una expresión anterior para formar una nueva expresión.

rdf:Description.reg:name: contributor
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has contributor
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a person, family, or corporate body contributing to an expression.
rdf:Description.skos:scopeNote: Contributors include editors, translators, arrangers of music, performers, etc.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A person, family, or corporate body contributing to an expression.
Personne, famille ou collectivité contribuant à une expression.
Una persona, familia o entidad corporativa que contribuye a una expresión.

rdf:Description.reg:name: costumeDesigner
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has costume designer
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a person, family, or corporate body contributing to an expression of a work by designing the costumes for a moving image production or for a musical or dramatic presentation or entertainment.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A person, family, or corporate body contributing to an expression of a work by designing the costumes for a moving image production or for a musical or dramatic presentation or entertainment.

Personne, famille ou collectivité contribuant à une expression d’une œuvre en créant les costumes pour une production d’images animées ou bien pour une représentation ou un spectacle musical ou dramatique.

Una persona, familia o entidad corporativa que contribuye a una expresión de una obra diseñando el vestuario para una producción de una imagen en movimiento o para una producción teatral o musical o un espectáculo.

rdf:Description.reg:name: courtReporter
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has court reporter
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a person, family, or corporate body contributing to an expression of a work by preparing a court's opinions for publication.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A person, family, or corporate body contributing to an expression of a work by preparing a court's opinions for publication.
Personne, famille ou collectivité contribuant à une expression d’une œuvre en préparant les opinions d’un tribunal aux fins de publication.
Una persona, familia o entidad corporativa que contribuye a una expresión de una obra preparando las opiniones del tribunal para publicación.

rdf:Description.reg:name: critiquedInExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is critiqued in (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a expression to a work that contains a critical evaluation of the described expression.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work that contains a critical evaluation of the described expression.
Expression d’une œuvre qui contient une évaluation critique de l’expression décrite.
Una obra que contiene una evaluación crítica de la expresión descrita.

rdf:Description.reg:name: dancer
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has dancer
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a performer contributing to an expression of a work by dancing in a musical, dramatic, etc., presentation.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A performer contributing to an expression of a work by dancing in a musical, dramatic, etc., presentation.
Interprète contribuant à une expression d’une œuvre en dansant dans une représentation musicale ou dramatique, etc.
Un intérprete que contribuye a una expresión de una obra danzando en una presentación musical, dramática, etc.

rdf:Description.reg:name: dateOfCapture
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has date of capture
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a date or range of dates associated with the capture (i.e., recording, filming, etc.) of the content of a resource.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A date or range of dates associated with the capture (i.e., recording, filming, etc.) of the content of a resource.
La date ou la fourchette de dates associée à la captation (c’est-à-dire l’enregistrement, le tournage, etc.) du contenu de la ressource.
Una fecha o rango de fechas asociadas con la captura (i.e, grabación, filmación, etc.) del contenido del recurso.

rdf:Description.reg:name: dateOfExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has date of expression
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to the earliest date associated with an expression.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: The earliest date associated with an expression.
La date la plus ancienne associée à une expression.
La fecha más antigua asociada con una expresión.

rdf:Description.reg:name: derivativeExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is derivative (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression that is a modification of a source expression.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression that is a modification of a source expression.
Expression qui est une modification d’une expression source.
Una expresión que es una modificación de una expresión fuente.

rdf:Description.reg:name: derivativeExpressionRelationship
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has derivative expression relationship with
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that is based on or is a derivative of the expression.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that is based on or is a derivative of the expression.
Expression d’une œuvre qui est basée sur l’expression ou en constitue un dérivé.
Una expresión de una obra que se basa en, o es una derivada de la expresión.

rdf:Description.reg:name: describedInExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is described in (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a work that describes a described expression.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work that describes a described expression.
Expression d’une œuvre qui décrit une expression.
Una obra que describe una expresión descrita.

rdf:Description.reg:name: detailsOfAspectRatio
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has details of aspect ratio
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to details of the ratio of the width to the height of a moving image.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: Details of the ratio of the width to the height of a moving image.
Detalles de la relación de la anchura con la altura de una imagen móvil.

rdf:Description.reg:name: detailsOfColourContent
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has details of colour content
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to details of the presence of colour, tone, etc., in the content of a resource, and the specific colours, tones, etc., (including black and white) present.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: Details of the presence of colour, tone, etc., in the content of a resource, and the specific colours, tones, etc., (including black and white) present.
Detalles de la presencia de color, tono, etc., y los colores específicos, tonos, etc. (incluyendo blanco y negro) presentes en el contenido de un recurso.

rdf:Description.reg:name: detailsOfDuration
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has details of duration
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to details of the playing time, running time, performance time, etc., of the content of a resource.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: The playing time, running time, performance time, etc., of the content of a resource.
Tiempo de reproducción, duración, interpretación, etc., del contenido de un recurso.

rdf:Description.reg:name: detailsOfFormatOfNotatedMusic
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has details of format of notated music
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to details of the musical or physical layout of the content of a resource that is presented in the form of musical notation.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitLabel: details of format of notated music
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: Details of the musical or physical layout of the content of a resource that is presented in the form of musical notation.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitLabel: detalles del formato de la música notada
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: Detalles de la presentación musical o física del contenido de un recurso que se presenta en forma de notación musical.

rdf:Description.reg:name: detailsOfFormOfMusicalNotation
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has details of form of musical notation
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to details of the set of characters and/or symbols used to express the musical content of a resource.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitLabel: details of form of musical notation
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: Details of the set of characters and/or symbols used to express the musical content of a resource.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitLabel: detalles de la forma de la notación musical
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: Detalles del conjunto de caracteres y/o símbolos utilizados para expresar el contenido musical de un recurso.

rdf:Description.reg:name: detailsOfFormOfNotatedMovement
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has details of form of notated movement
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to details of the set of characters and/or symbols used to express the movement content of a resource.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitLabel: details of form of notated movement
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: Details of the set of characters and/or symbols used to express the movement content of a resource.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitLabel: detalles de la forma de notación de movimientos
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: Detalles del conjunto de caracteres y/o símbolos usados para expresar el contenido de movimientos de un recurso.

rdf:Description.reg:name: detailsOfFormOfTactileNotation
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has details of form of tactile notation
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to details of the set of characters and/or symbols used to express the content of a resource in a form that can be perceived through touch.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitLabel: details of form of tactile notation
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: Details of the set of characters and/or symbols used to express the content of a resource in a form that can be perceived through touch.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitLabel: detalles de la forma de la notación táctil
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: Detalles del conjunto de caracteres y/o símbolos utilizados para expresar el contenido de un recurso en tal forma que se pueda percibir mediante el tacto.

rdf:Description.reg:name: detailsOfIllustrativeContent
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has details of illustrative content
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to details of content intended to illustrate the primary content of a resource.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: Details of content intended to illustrate the primary content of a resource.
Detalles del contenido destinado a ilustrar el contenido primario de un recurso.

rdf:Description.reg:name: detailsOfScript
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has details of script
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to details of the set of characters and/or symbols used to express the written language content of a resource.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: Details of the set of characters and/or symbols used to express the written language content of a resource.
Detalles del conjunto de caracteres y/o símbolos usados para expresar el contenido de lengua escrita de un recurso.

rdf:Description.reg:name: digestedAsExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is digested as (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that systematically and comprehensively condenses the source expression.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that systematically and comprehensively condenses the source expression.
Expression d’une œuvre qui abrège de manière systématique et complète l’expression source.
Una expresión de una obra que sistemática e integralmente condensa la expresión fuente.

rdf:Description.reg:name: digestOfExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is digest of (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that has been digested, i.e., systematically and comprehensively condensed.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that has been digested, i.e., systematically and comprehensively condensed.
Expression d’une œuvre qui a été condensée, c’est-à-dire abrégée de manière systématique et complète.
Una expresión de una obra que ha sido resumida, i.e., condensada sistemática e integralmente.

rdf:Description.reg:name: draftsman
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has draftsman
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a person, family, or corporate body contributing to an expression of a work by an architect, inventor, etc., by making detailed plans or drawings for buildings, ships, aircraft, machines, objects, etc.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A person, family, or corporate body contributing to an expression of a work by an architect, inventor, etc., by making detailed plans or drawings for buildings, ships, aircraft, machines, objects, etc.

Personne, famille ou collectivité contribuant à une expression d’une œuvre par un architecte, un inventeur, etc. en effectuant des plans ou des dessins détaillés pour des bâtiments, des navires, des avions, des machines, des objets, etc.

Una persona, familia o entidad corporativa que contribuye a una expresión de una obra de un arquitecto, inventor, etc., haciendo planos o dibujos detallados de edificios, barcos, aviones, máquinas, objetos, etc.

rdf:Description.reg:name: dramatizationOfExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is dramatization of (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that has been adapted as a drama.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that has been adapted as a drama.
Expression d’une œuvre qui a été adaptée en pièce de théâtre.
Una expresión de una obra que fue adaptada como drama.

rdf:Description.reg:name: dramatizedAsExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is dramatized as (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a dramatic work adapted from the source expression.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a dramatic work adapted from the source expression.
Expression d’une œuvre théâtrale adaptée de l’expression source.
Una expresión de una obra dramática adaptada de la expresión fuente.

rdf:Description.reg:name: dubbedVersion
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is dubbed version
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a moving image work that translates the spoken dialogue of the original work into a different language.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a moving image work that translates the spoken dialogue of the original work into a different language.
Expression d’une œuvre d’images animées qui traduit les dialogues parlés de l’œuvre d’origine dans une langue différente.
Una expresión de una obra de imagen en movimiento que traduce el diálogo hablado de la obra original en una lengua diferente.

rdf:Description.reg:name: dubbedVersionOf
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is dubbed version of
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a moving image work in which the spoken dialogue has been translated into a language different from that of the original work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a moving image work in which the spoken dialogue has been translated into a language different from that of the original work.
Expression d’une œuvre d’images animées dans laquelle les dialogues parlés ont été traduits dans une langue différente de celle de l’œuvre d’origine.
Una expresión de una obra de imagen en movimiento en la cual el diálogo hablado se ha traducido a una lengua diferente de la de la obra original.

rdf:Description.reg:name: duration
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has duration
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to the playing time, performance time, running time, etc., of the content of a resource.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: The playing time, performance time, running time, etc., of the content of a resource.
La durée de lecture, de projection, etc. du contenu de la ressource.
El tiempo de reproducción, el tiempo de interpretación, etc., del contenido de un recurso.

rdf:Description.reg:name: editor
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has editor
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a person, family, or corporate body contributing to an expression of a work by revising or clarifying the content, or by selecting and putting together works, or parts of works, by one or more creators.
rdf:Description.skos:scopeNote: Contributions may include adding an introduction, notes, or other critical matter, or preparing the expression of a work for production, publication, or distribution.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A person, family, or corporate body contributing to an expression of a work by revising or clarifying the content, or by selecting and putting together works, or parts of works, by one or more creators.

Personne, famille ou collectivité contribuant à une expression d’une œuvre en révisant ou en clarifiant le contenu, ou bien en choisissant et en rassemblant des œuvres, ou des parties d’œuvres, d’un ou de plusieurs créateurs.
Una persona, familia o entidad corporativa que contribuye a una expresión de una obra revisando o aclarando el contenido, por ej., agregando una introducción, notas u otro material crítico.

rdf:Description.reg:name: editorOfMovingImageWork
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has editor of moving image work
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a person, family, or corporate body responsible for assembling, arranging, and trimming film, video, or other moving image formats, including both visual and audio aspects.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A person, family, or corporate body responsible for assembling, arranging, and trimming film, video, or other moving image formats, including both visual and audio aspects.
Personne, famille ou collectivité responsable de l’assemblage, de l’arrangement et du découpage de film, de vidéo ou d’autres formats d’images animées, y compris les aspects visuels et sonores.

Una persona, familia o entidad corporativa responsable de unir, componer y recortar película cinematográfica, video u otros formatos de imágenes en movimiento, incluyendo tanto aspectos visuales como de sonido.

rdf:Description.reg:name: errataExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is errata (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work consisting of errors discovered after the publication of the predominant work, with their corrections.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work consisting of errors discovered after the publication of the predominant work, with their corrections.
Expression d’une œuvre constituée des erreurs découvertes après la publication de l’œuvre prédominante, avec leurs corrections.
Una expresión de una obra que consiste en los errores descubiertos después de la publicación de la obra principal, con sus correcciones.

rdf:Description.reg:name: errataToExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is errata to (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that is augmented by a list of errors in the predominant work, discovered after publication, with their corrections.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that is augmented by a list of errors in the predominant work, discovered after publication, with their corrections.
Expression d’une œuvre qui est augmentée d’une liste d’erreurs dans l’œuvre prédominante, découvertes après publication, avec leurs corrections.
Una expresión de una obra que es aumentada por una lista de errores en la obra principal, descubiertos después de la publicación, con sus correcciones.

rdf:Description.reg:name: evaluatedInExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is evaluated in (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a expression to a work that examines or judges the described expression.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work that examines or judges the described expression.
Expression d’une œuvre qui examine ou juge l’expression décrite.
Una obra que examina o juzga la expresión descrita.

rdf:Description.reg:name: expandedAsExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is expanded as (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that enlarges upon the content of the source work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that enlarges upon the content of the source work.
Expression d’une œuvre qui accroît le contenu de l’œuvre source.
Una expresión de una obra que extiende el contenido de la obra fuente.

rdf:Description.reg:name: expandedVersionOfExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is expanded version of (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work used as the basis for a derivative work that enlarges upon the content of the source work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work used as the basis for a derivative work that enlarges upon the content of the source work.
Expression d’une œuvre servant de base à une œuvre dérivée qui accroît le contenu de l’œuvre source.
Una expresión de una obra utilizada como base para una obra derivada que alarga el contenido de la obra fuente.

rdf:Description.reg:name: findingAidExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is finding aid (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that provides a guide to the organization, arrangement, and contents of an archival collection.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that provides a guide to the organization, arrangement, and contents of an archival collection.
Expression d’une œuvre qui fournit un guide de l’organisation, du classement et du contenu d’une collection ou d’un fonds d’archives.
Una expresión de una obra que proporciona una guía para la organización, ordenación y contenido de una colección archivística.

rdf:Description.reg:name: findingAidForExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is finding aid for (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of an archival collection that is described in a finding aid, i.e., a guide to the organization, arrangement, and contents of the collection.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of an archival collection that is described in a finding aid, i.e., a guide to the organization, arrangement, and contents of the collection.
Expression d’une collection ou d’un fonds d’archives qui est décrit dans un instrument de recherche, c’est-à-dire un guide de l’organisation, du classement et du contenu de la collection ou du fonds.
Una expresión de una colección archivística que está descrita en una guía de búsqueda, i.e., una guía para la organización, ordenación y contenido de la colección.

rdf:Description.reg:name: formatOfNotatedMusic
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has format of notated music
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to the musical or physical layout of the content of a resource that is presented in the form of musical notation.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: The musical or physical layout of the content of a resource that is presented in the form of musical notation.
La disposition musicale ou matérielle du contenu d’une ressource qui se présente sous la forme d’une notation musicale.
La presentación musical o física del contenido de un recurso que se presenta en forma de notación musical.

rdf:Description.reg:name: formOfMusicalNotation
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has form of musical notation
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a set of characters and/or symbols used to express the musical content of a resource.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A set of characters and/or symbols used to express the musical content of a resource.
Ensemble de signes et/ou de symboles utilisés pour exprimer le contenu musical d’une ressource
Un conjunto de caracteres y/o símbolos utilizados para expresar el contenido musical de un recurso.

rdf:Description.reg:name: formOfNotatedMovement
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has form of notated movement
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a set of characters and/or symbols used to express the movement content of a resource.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A set of characters and/or symbols used to express the movement content of a resource.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitLabel: forme de la notation du mouvement
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: Ensemble de signes et/ou de caractères utilisés pour exprimer le contenu du mouvement d’une ressource.
Un conjunto de caracteres y/o símbolos usados para expresar el contenido de movimientos de un recurso.

rdf:Description.reg:name: formOfNotation
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has form of notation
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a set of characters and/or symbols used to express the content of a resource.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A set of characters and/or symbols used to express the content of a resource.
Ensemble de signes et/ou de symboles utilisés pour exprimer le contenu d’une ressource.
Un conjunto de caracteres y/o símbolos utilizados para expresar el contenido de un recurso.

rdf:Description.reg:name: formOfTactileNotation
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has form of tactile notation
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a set of characters and/or symbols used to express the content of a resource in a form that can be perceived through touch.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A set of characters and/or symbols used to express the content of a resource in a form that can be perceived through touch.
Ensemble de signes et/ou de symboles utilisés pour exprimer le contenu d’une ressource sous une forme perceptible au toucher.
Un conjunto de caracteres y/o símbolos utilizados para expresar el contenido de un recurso en tal forma que se pueda percibir mediante el tacto.
