rdf:Description.reg:name: freelyTranslatedAsExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is freely translated as (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that freely translates the text into another language, preserving the spirit of the original, but not its linguistic details.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that freely translates the text into another language, preserving the spirit of the original, but not its linguistic details.
Expression d’une œuvre qui traduit librement le texte dans une autre langue, de façon à préserver l’esprit de l’original, mais non ses particularités linguistiques.
Una expresión de una obra que traduce libremente el texto en otra lengua, preservando el espíritu del original, pero no sus detalles lingüísticos.

rdf:Description.reg:name: freeTranslationOfExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is free translation of (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that has been translated freely, preserving the spirit of the original, but not its linguistic details.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that has been translated freely, preserving the spirit of the original, but not its linguistic details.
Expression d’une œuvre qui a été librement traduite en préservant l’esprit de l’original, mais non ses particularités linguistiques.
Una expresión de una obra que fue traducida libremente, preservando el espíritu del original, pero no sus detalles lingüísticos.

rdf:Description.reg:name: graphicNovelizationOfExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is graphic novelization of (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that has been adapated as a graphic novel.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that has been adapated as a graphic novel.
Expression d’une œuvre qui a été adaptée en roman graphique.
Una expresión de una obra que ha sido adaptada como una novela gráfica.

rdf:Description.reg:name: guideExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is guide (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that guides a user through the use of the predominant work, using notes, learning and study aids, exercises, problems, questions and answers, instructor or student materials, etc.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that guides a user through the use of the predominant work, using notes, learning and study aids, exercises, problems, questions and answers, instructor or student materials, etc.

Expression d’une œuvre qui guide un utilisateur à travers l’œuvre prédominante au moyen de notes, d’outils pédagogiques, d’exercices, de problèmes, de questions et réponses, de matériel didactique, etc.

Una expresión de una obra que guía al usuario a través del uso de la obra principal, utilizando notas, ayudas de aprendizaje y estudio, ejercicios, problemas, preguntas y respuestas, materiales para el instructor o el estudiante, etc.

rdf:Description.reg:name: guideToExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is guide to (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that is augmented by another work consisting of material to help the user of the predominant work, such as notes, learning and study aids, exercises, problems, questions and answers, instructor or student materials, etc.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that is augmented by another work consisting of material to help the user of the predominant work, such as notes, learning and study aids, exercises, problems, questions and answers, instructor or student materials, etc.

Expression d’une œuvre qui est augmentée par une autre œuvre consistant en documentation destinée à aider l’utilisateur de l’œuvre prédominante, telle que des notes, des outils pédagogiques, des exercices, des problèmes, des questions et réponses, du matériel didactique, etc.

Una expresión de una obra que es aumentada por otra obra que consiste en material de ayuda para el usuario de la obra principal, tal como notas, ayudas de aprendizaje y estudio, ejercicios, problemas, preguntas y respuestas, materiales para el instructor y el estudiante, etc.

rdf:Description.reg:name: horizontalScaleOfCartographicContent
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has horizontal scale of cartographic content
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to the ratio of horizontal distances in the cartographic content of a resource to the actual distances they represent.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: The ratio of horizontal distances in the cartographic content of a resource to the actual distances they represent.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitLabel: échelle des longueurs d’un contenu cartographique
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: Le rapport entre les distances horizontales dans le contenu cartographique d’une ressource et les distances réelles qu’elles représentent.
La proporción de las distancias horizontales en el contenido cartográfico de un recurso con las distancias reales que representan.

rdf:Description.reg:name: host
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has host
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a performer contributing to an expression of a work by leading a program (often broadcast) that includes other guests, performers, etc. (e.g., talk show host).
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A performer contributing to an expression of a work by leading a program (often broadcast) that includes other guests, performers, etc. (e.g., talk show host).
Interprète contribuant à une expression d’une œuvre en dirigeant une émission (souvent diffusée) qui comprend d’autres invités, interprètes, etc. (par exemple, un animateur d’émission-débat).

Un intérprete que contribuye a una expresión de una obra dirigiendo un programa (a menudo una transmisión) que incluye otros invitados, intérpretes, etc., ( por ej., presentadores de programas de debates).

rdf:Description.reg:name: identifierForTheExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has identifier for the expression
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a character string uniquely associated with an expression, or with a surrogate for an expression (e.g., an authority record).
rdf:Description.skos:scopeNote: The identifier serves to differentiate that expression from other expressions.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A character string uniquely associated with an expression, or with a surrogate for an expression (e.g., an authority record).
Chaîne de caractères associée de manière unique à une expression ou à un substitut d’une expression (par exemple, une notice d’autorité), qui sert à distinguer cette expression d’autres expressions.
Una cadena de caracteres unívocamente asociada con una expresión, o con un substituto de una expresión (p.ej., un registro de autoridad).

rdf:Description.reg:name: illustrationsExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is illustrations (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work consisting of pictorial content designed to explain or decorate the augmented expression.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work consisting of pictorial content designed to explain or decorate the augmented expression.
Expression d’une œuvre consistant en contenu visuel destiné à expliquer ou à décorer l’expression augmentée.
Una expresión de una obra que consiste en contenido pictórico diseñado para explicar o decorar la entidad aumentada.

rdf:Description.reg:name: illustrationsForExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is illustrations for (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that is augmented by pictorial content designed to explain or decorate it.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that is augmented by pictorial content designed to explain or decorate it.
Expression d’une œuvre qui est augmentée par du contenu visuel destiné à l’expliquer ou à la décorer.
Una expresión de una obra que es aumentada con contenido pictórico diseñado para explicarla o decorarla.

rdf:Description.reg:name: illustrativeContent
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has illustrative content
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to content intended to illustrate the primary content of a resource.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: Content intended to illustrate the primary content of a resource.
Contenu destiné à illustrer le contenu principal d’une ressource.
Contenido destinado a ilustrar el contenido primario de un recurso..

rdf:Description.reg:name: illustrator
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has illustrator
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a person, family, or corporate body contributing to an expression of a work by supplementing the primary content with drawings, diagrams, photographs, etc.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A person, family, or corporate body contributing to an expression of a work by supplementing the primary content with drawings, diagrams, photographs, etc.
Personne, famille ou collectivité contribuant à une expression d’une œuvre en complétant le contenu principal avec des dessins, des diagrammes, des photographies, etc.
Una persona, familia o entidad corporativa que contribuye a una expresión de una obra complementando el contenido primario con dibujos, diagramas, fotografías, etc.

rdf:Description.reg:name: imitatedAsExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is imitated as (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that copies the style or content of the source work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that copies the style or content of the source work.
Expression d’une œuvre qui copie le style ou le contenu de l’œuvre source.
Una expresión de una obra que copia el estilo o contenido de la obra fuente.

rdf:Description.reg:name: imitationOfExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is imitation of (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work whose style or content is copied in a derivative work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work whose style or content is copied in a derivative work.
Expression d’une œuvre dont le style ou le contenu est copié dans une œuvre dérivée.
Una expresión de una obra cuyo estilo o contenido es copiado en una obra derivada.

rdf:Description.reg:name: incidentalMusicExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is incidental music (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a musical work that that provides the incidental music for a play or other spoken work for the stage.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a musical work that that provides the incidental music for a play or other spoken work for the stage.
Expression d’une œuvre musicale qui fournit la musique de scène pour une pièce de théâtre ou une autre œuvre parlée pour la scène.
Una expresión de una obra musical que proporciona la música incidental para una obra de teatro u otra obra hablada para el escenario.

rdf:Description.reg:name: incidentalMusicForExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is incidental music for (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work such as a play or other spoken work for the stage that uses the musical work as incidental music.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work such as a play or other spoken work for the stage that uses the musical work as incidental music.
Expression d’une œuvre telle qu’une pièce de théâtre ou une autre œuvre parlée pour la scène qui utilise l’œuvre musicale comme musique de scène.
Una expresión de una obra tal como una obra de teatro u otra obra hablada para escena que usa la obra musical como música incidental.

rdf:Description.reg:name: indexedInExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is indexed in (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work (an abstracting and indexing service) that indexes the contents of a source expression.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work (an abstracting and indexing service) that indexes the contents of a source expression.
Expression d’une œuvre (service d’analyse et d’indexation) qui indexe le contenu d’une expression source.
Una expresión de una obra (un servicio de indización y resúmenes) que indiza el contenido de una expresión fuente.

rdf:Description.reg:name: indexExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is index (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that provides a systematic, alphabetical guide to the contents of the predominant expression, usually keyed to page numbers or other reference codes.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that provides a systematic, alphabetical guide to the contents of the predominant expression, usually keyed to page numbers or other reference codes.
Expression d’une œuvre qui fournit un guide méthodique et alphabétique du contenu de l’expression prédominante, renvoyant généralement à des numéros de page ou à d’autres codes de référence.
Una expresión de una obra que proporciona una guía alfabética y sistemática al contenido de la entidad principal, generalmente indicando los números de página u otros códigos de referencia.

rdf:Description.reg:name: indexingForExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is indexing for (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work whose contents have been indexed by an abstracting and indexing service.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work whose contents have been indexed by an abstracting and indexing service.
Expression d’une œuvre dont le contenu a été indexé par un service d’analyse et d’indexation.
Una expresión de una obra cuyo contenido ha sido indizado por un servicio de indización y resúmenes.

rdf:Description.reg:name: indexToExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is index to (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work used as the basis for an index, i.e., a systematic, alphabetical guide to the contents of the predominant expression, usually keyed to page numbers or other reference codes.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work used as the basis for an index, i.e., a systematic, alphabetical guide to the contents of the predominant expression, usually keyed to page numbers or other reference codes.

Expression d’une œuvre servant de base à un index, c’est-à-dire un guide méthodique et alphabétique du contenu de l’expression prédominante, renvoyant généralement à des numéros de page ou à d’autres codes de référence.

Una expresión de una obra utilizada como base para un índice, i.e., una guía alfabética y sistemática del contenido la entidad principal, generalmente indicando los números de página u otros códigos de referencia.

rdf:Description.reg:name: instrumentalConductor
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has instrumental conductor
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a conductor contributing to an expression of a musical work by leading an instrumental performing group in a musical or dramatic presentation, etc.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A conductor contributing to an expression of a musical work by leading an instrumental performing group in a musical or dramatic presentation, etc.
Un intérprete que contribuye a la expresión de una obra musical dirigiendo un grupo de interpretación instrumental en una presentación musical o teatral, etc.

rdf:Description.reg:name: instrumentalist
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has instrumentalist
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a performer contributing to an expression of a work by playing a musical instrument.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A performer contributing to an expression of a work by playing a musical instrument.
Interprète contribuant à une expression d’une œuvre en jouant d’un instrument de musique.
Un intérprete que contribuye a una expresión de una obra tocando un instrumento musical.

rdf:Description.reg:name: intervieweeExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has interviewee (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a person, family, or corporate body contributing to an expression of a work by responding to an interviewer, usually a reporter, pollster, or some other information gathering agent.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A person, family, or corporate body contributing to an expression of a work by responding to an interviewer, usually a reporter, pollster, or some other information gathering agent.
Personne, famille ou collectivité contribuant à une expression d’une œuvre en répondant à un intervieweur, habituellement un journaliste, un sondeur ou un autre agent recueillant de l’information.

Una persona, familia o entidad corporativa que contribuye a una expresión de una obra respondiendo a un entrevistador, generalmente un reportero, encuestador, o algún otro agente recolector de información.

rdf:Description.reg:name: interviewerExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has interviewer (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a person, family, or corporate body contributing to an expression of a work by acting as an interviewer, reporter, pollster, or some other information gathering agent.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A person, family, or corporate body contributing to an expression of a work by acting as an interviewer, reporter, pollster, or some other information gathering agent.
Personne, famille ou collectivité contribuant à une expression d’une œuvre en agissant à titre d’intervieweur, de journaliste, de sondeur ou d’autre agent recueillant de l’information.
Una persona, familia o entidad corporativa que contribuye a una expresión de una obra actuando como entrevistador, reportero, encuestador, o algún otro agente recolector de información.

rdf:Description.reg:name: languageOfExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has language of expression
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a language in which a work is expressed.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A language in which a work is expressed.
Langue dans laquelle une œuvre est exprimée.
Una lengua en la que se expresa una obra

rdf:Description.reg:name: languageOfTheContent
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has language of the content
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a language used to express the content of a resource.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A language used to express the content of a resource.
Langue utilisée pour exprimer le contenu d’une ressource.
Una lengua utilizada para expresar el contenido de un recurso.

rdf:Description.reg:name: letterer
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has letterer
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an illustrator contributing to an expression of a comic book, graphic novel, etc., by drawing the text and graphic sound effects.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An illustrator contributing to an expression of a comic book, graphic novel, etc., by drawing the text and graphic sound effects.
Illustrateur contribuant à une expression d’une bande dessinée, d’un roman graphique, etc. en dessinant le texte et les effets sonores graphiques.
Un ilustrador que contribuye a una expresión de un libro cómico, novela gráfica, etc., mediante el dibujo del texto y efectos de sonido gráfico.

rdf:Description.reg:name: librettoBasedOnExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is libretto based on (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that has been adapted as the text of an opera or other work for the musical stage, or an oratorio.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work used as the basis for the text of an opera or other work for the musical stage, or an oratorio.
Expression d’une œuvre servant de base au texte d’un opéra ou d’une autre œuvre pour la scène musicale, ou bien d’un oratorio.
Una expresión de una obra usada como base para el texto de una ópera u otra obra para representación musical u oratorio.

rdf:Description.reg:name: librettoExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is libretto (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that provides the text of an opera or other work for the musical stage, or an oratorio.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that provides the text of an opera or other work for the musical stage, or an oratorio.
Expression d’une œuvre qui fournit le texte d’un opéra ou d’une autre œuvre pour la scène musicale, ou bien d’un oratorio.
Una expresión de una obra que proporciona el texto de una ópera u otra obra para representación musical, o un oratorio.

rdf:Description.reg:name: librettoForExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is libretto for (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a musical work such as an opera or other work for the musical stage, or an oratorio, that uses the text of the related work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a musical work such as an opera or other work for the musical stage, or an oratorio, that uses the text of the related work.
Expression d’une œuvre musicale telle qu’un opéra ou une autre œuvre pour la scène musicale, ou telle qu’un oratorio, qui utilise le texte de l’œuvre en relation.
Una expresión de una obra musical tal como una ópera u otra obra para representación musical, o un oratorio, que utiliza el texto de la obra relacionada.

rdf:Description.reg:name: lightingDesigner
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has lighting designer
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a person, family, or corporate body contributing to an expression of a work by designing and creating lighting components.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A person, family, or corporate body contributing to an expression of a work by designing and creating lighting components.
Una persona, familia o entidad corporativa que contribuye a una expresión de una obra mediante el diseño y la creación de componentes de iluminación.

rdf:Description.reg:name: makeUpArtist
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has make-up artist
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a person, family, or corporate body contributing to an expression of a work by applying make-up and prosthetics for a moving image production or for a musical or dramatic presentation or entertainment.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A person, family, or corporate body contributing to an expression of a work by applying make-up and prosthetics for a moving image production or for a musical or dramatic presentation or entertainment.

Una persona, familia o entidad corporativa que contribuye a una expresión de una obra mediante la aplicación de maquillaje y prótesis para una producción de imágenes en movimiento o para una presentación o espectáculo musical o dramático.

rdf:Description.reg:name: manifestationOfExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has manifestation of expression
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a physical embodiment of an expression.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A physical embodiment of an expression.
Matérialisation d’une expression.
Una materialización física de una expresión.

rdf:Description.reg:name: mediumOfPerformanceOfMusicalContent
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has medium of performance of musical content
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to the instrument, instruments, voice, voices, etc., used (or intended to be used) for performance of musical content.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitLabel: medium of performance of musical content
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: The instrument, instruments, voice, voices, etc., used (or intended to be used) for performance of musical content.
Le ou les instruments, la ou les voix, etc. utilisés (ou destinés à être utilisés) dans une exécution d’un contenu musical.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitLabel: medio de interpretación del contenido musical
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: El instrumento, instrumentos, voz, voces, etc., utilizados para (o con el propósito de ser utilizados para) la ejecución del contenido musical.

rdf:Description.reg:name: mergedToFormExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is merged to form (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work formed from the coming together of two or more expressions.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work formed from the coming together of two or more expressions.
Expression d’une œuvre formée par l’assemblage de deux ou plusieurs expressions.
Una expresión de una obra formada de la unión de dos o más expresiones.

rdf:Description.reg:name: mergerOfExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is merger of (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that came together with one or more other expressions to form the new expression.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that came together with one or more other expressions to form the new expression.
Expression d’une œuvre qui s’est assemblée avec une ou plusieurs autres expressions pour former la nouvelle expression.
Una expresión de una obra que se une con una o más expresiones para formar una expresión nueva.

rdf:Description.reg:name: minuteTaker
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has minute taker
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a person, family, or corporate body, responsible for recording the minutes of a meeting.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A person, family, or corporate body, responsible for recording the minutes of a meeting.
Personne, famille ou collectivité responsable de rédiger le procès-verbal d’une réunion.
Una persona, familia o entidad corporativa responsable de registrar las actas de una reunión.

rdf:Description.reg:name: moderator
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has moderator
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a performer contributing to an expression of a work by leading a program (often broadcast) where topics are discussed, usually with participation of experts in fields related to the discussion.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A performer contributing to an expression of a work by leading a program (often broadcast) where topics are discussed, usually with participation of experts in fields related to the discussion.

Interprète contribuant à une expression d’une œuvre en dirigeant une émission (souvent diffusée) où des sujets sont discutés, habituellement avec la participation d’experts dans les domaines reliés à la discussion.

Un intérprete que contribuye a una expresión de una obra dirigiendo un programa (a menudo una transmisión) en el cual los temas se discuten generalmente con la participación de expertos en esos temas.

rdf:Description.reg:name: modifiedByVariationAsExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is modified by variation as (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a musical work in which melodic, thematic, or harmonic material taken from the source work forms a discrete theme, which is repeated one or more times with subsequent modifications.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a musical work in which melodic, thematic, or harmonic material taken from the source work forms a discrete theme, which is repeated one or more times with subsequent modifications.

Expression d’une œuvre musicale dans laquelle de la matière mélodique, thématique ou harmonique tirée de l’œuvre source forme un thème distinct qui est répété une ou plusieurs fois avec des modifications subséquentes.

Una expresión de una obra musical en la cual el material melódico, temático o harmónico se toma de la obra fuente para formar un tema separado, el cual se repite una o mas veces con las subsecuentes modificaciones.

rdf:Description.reg:name: motionPictureAdaptationOfExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is motion picture adaptation of (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that has been adapted as a motion picture.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that has been adapted as a motion picture.
Expression d’une œuvre qui a été adaptée en film.
Una expresión de una obra que fue adaptada como película cinematográfica.

rdf:Description.reg:name: motionPictureMusicExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is motion picture music (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a musical work that is used in a motion picture.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a musical work that is used in a motion picture.
Expression d’une œuvre musicale utilisée dans un film.
Una expresión de una obra musical que es usada en una película cinematográfica.

rdf:Description.reg:name: motionPictureScreenplayBasedOnExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is motion picture screenplay based on (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that has been adapted as the screenplay for a motion picture.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that has been adapted as the screenplay for a motion picture.
Expression d’une œuvre qui a été adaptée en scénario pour un film.
Una expresión de una obra que fue adaptada como guión para una película cinematográfica, programa de televisión o vídeo.

rdf:Description.reg:name: motionPictureScreenplayExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is motion picture screenplay (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that provides the text for a motion picture.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that provides the text for a motion picture.
Expression d’une œuvre qui fournit le texte d’un film.
Una expresión de una obra que proporciona el texto para una película cinematográfica.

rdf:Description.reg:name: musicalDirector
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has musical director
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a person, family, or corporate body contributing to an expression of a work by coordinating the activities of the composer, the sound editor, and sound mixers for a moving image production or for a musical or dramatic presentation or entertainment.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A person, family, or corporate body contributing to an expression of a work by coordinating the activities of the composer, the sound editor, and sound mixers for a moving image production or for a musical or dramatic presentation or entertainment.

Personne, famille ou collectivité contribuant à une expression d’une œuvre en coordonnant les activités du compositeur, du monteur son et des mixeurs de son pour une production d’images animées ou bien pour une représentation ou un spectacle dramatique ou musical.

Una persona, familia o entidad corporativa que contribuye a una expresión de una obra coordinando las actividades del compositor, el editor de sonido, y los mezcladores de sonido para una producción de una imagen en movimiento o para una producción teatral, musical o un espectáculo.

rdf:Description.reg:name: musicalSettingOfExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is musical setting of (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that provides the text for a non-dramatic musical work, other than an oratorio.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that provides the text for a non-dramatic musical work, other than an oratorio.
Expression d’une œuvre qui fournit le texte d’une œuvre musicale non théâtrale, autre qu’un oratorio.
Una expresión de una obra que proporciona el texto de una obra musical no dramática, diferente de un oratorio.

rdf:Description.reg:name: musicalTheatreAdaptationOfExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is musical theatre adaptation of (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that has been adapted as a musical theatre work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that has been adapted as a musical theatre work.
Expression d’une œuvre qui a été adaptée en œuvre de théâtre musical.
Una expresión de una obra que ha sido adaptada como una obra de teatro musical.

rdf:Description.reg:name: musicExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is music (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a musical work that is used in a motion picture, play, television program, etc.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a musical work that is used in a motion picture, play, television program, etc.
Expression d’une œuvre musicale utilisée dans un film, une pièce de théâtre, une émission de télévision, etc.
Una expresión de una obra musical que se usa en una película cinematográfica, obra de teatro, programa de televisión, etc.

rdf:Description.reg:name: musicForExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is music for (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work such as a motion picture, play, television program, etc. that uses the musical work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work such as a motion picture, play, television program, etc. that uses the musical work.
Expression d’une œuvre telle qu’un film, une pièce de théâtre, une émission de télévision, etc. qui utilise l’œuvre musicale.
Una expresión de una obra tal como una película cinematográfica, obra de teatro, programa de televisión, etc., que usa una obra musical.

rdf:Description.reg:name: musicForMotionPictureExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is music for motion picture (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that uses the musical work in a motion picture.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that uses the musical work in a motion picture.
Expression d’une œuvre qui utilise l’œuvre musicale dans un film.
Una expresión de una obra que usa la obra musical en una película cinematográfica.

rdf:Description.reg:name: musicForRadioProgramExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is music for radio program (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that uses the musical work in a radio program.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that uses the musical work in a radio program.
Expression d’une œuvre qui utilise l’œuvre musicale dans une émission de radio.
Una expresión de una obra que usa la obra musical en un programa radiofónico.

rdf:Description.reg:name: musicForTelevisionProgramExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is music for television program (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that uses the musical work in a television program.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that uses the musical work in a television program.
Expression d’une œuvre qui utilise l’œuvre musicale dans une émission de télévision.
Una expresión de una obra que usa la obra musical en un programa de televisión.

rdf:Description.reg:name: musicForVideoExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is music for video (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that uses the musical work in a video.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that uses the musical work in a video.
Expression d’une œuvre qui utilise l’œuvre musicale dans une vidéo.
Una expresión de una obra que usa la obra musical en un video

rdf:Description.reg:name: narrator
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has narrator
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a performer contributing to an expression of a work by reading aloud or giving an account of an act, occurrence, course of events, etc.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A performer contributing to an expression of a work by reading alound or giving an account of an act, occurrence, course of events, etc.
Interprète contribuant à une expression d’une œuvre en lisant à voix haute ou en rendant compte d’une action, d’une situation, du déroulement des événements, etc.
Un intérprete que contribuye a una expresión de una obra leyendo en voz alta o hablando para dar cuenta de un acto, acontecimiento, desarrollo de eventos, etc.

rdf:Description.reg:name: noteOnChangesInContentCharacteristics
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has note on changes in content characteristics
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a note on changes in content characteristics that occur in subsequent issues or parts of a resource issued in successive parts or between iterations of an integrating resource.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitLabel: note on changes in content characteristics
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A note on changes in content characteristics that occur in subsequent issues or parts of a resource issued in successive parts or between iterations of an integrating resource.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitLabel: note relative aux changements de caractéristiques du contenu
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: Note portant sur les changements de caractéristiques du contenu survenant dans les livraisons ou les parties ultérieures d’une ressource publiée en parties successives ou bien entre les différentes itérations d’une ressource intégratrice.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitLabel: nota sobre cambios en las características del contenido
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: Una nota sobre cambios en las características que ocurren en entregas o partes subsecuentes de un recurso publicado en partes sucesivas o entre iteraciones de un recurso integrable.

rdf:Description.reg:name: noteOnExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has note on expression
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an annotation providing additional information about content recorded as an expression attribute.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An annotation providing additional information about content recorded as an expression attribute.
Annotation fournissant un complément d’information relatif au contenu enregistré comme attribut de l’expression.
Una anotación que proporciona información adicional sobre contenido registrado como un atributo de la expresión.

rdf:Description.reg:name: novelizationOfExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is novelization of (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that has been adapted as a novel.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that has been adapted as a novel.
Expression d’une œuvre qui a été adaptée en roman.
Una expresión de una obra que fue adaptada como novela.

rdf:Description.reg:name: onScreenParticipant
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has on-screen participant
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a person, family. or corporate body contributing to an expression of a nonfiction moving image work by taking an active role as a participant.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A person, family, or corporate body contributing to an expression of a nonfiction moving image work by taking an active role as a participant.
Una persona, familia o entidad corporativa que contribuye a una expresión de una obra de no ficción de imagen en movimiento mediante la adopción de un papel activo como participante.

rdf:Description.reg:name: onScreenPresenter
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has on-screen presenter
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a performer contributing to an expression of a work by appearing on screen to provide contextual or background information.
rdf:Description.skos:scopeNote: An on-screen presenter may appear in nonfiction moving image materials or in introductions to fiction moving image materials.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A performer contributing to an expression of a work by appearing on screen to provide contextual or background information.
Interprète contribuant à une expression d’une œuvre en apparaissant à l’écran pour fournir de l’information contextuelle ou complémentaire.
Un intérprete que contribuye a una expresión de una obra para ofrecer en pantalla información contextual o básica.

rdf:Description.reg:name: operaAdaptationOfExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is opera adaptation of (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that has been adapted as an opera.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that has been adapted as an opera.
Expression d’une œuvre qui a été adaptée à l’opéra.
Una expresión de una obra que ha sido adaptada como una ópera.

rdf:Description.reg:name: oratorioAdaptationOfExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is oratorio adaptation of (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that has been adapted as an oratorio.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that has been adapted as an oratorio.
Una expresión de una obra que ha sido adaptada como un oratorio.

rdf:Description.reg:name: otherDetailsOfCartographicContent
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has other details of cartographic content
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to mathematical data and other features of the cartographic content of a resource not recorded in statements of scale, projection, and coordinates.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: Mathematical data and other features of the cartographic content of a resource not recorded in statements of scale, projection, and coordinates.
Données mathématiques et autres particularités du contenu cartographique d’une ressource qui ne sont pas enregistrées dans les mentions d’échelle, de projection et de coordonnées.
Datos matemáticos y otras características del contenido cartográfico de un recurso, que no se han registrado en las menciones de escala, proyección y coordenadas.

rdf:Description.reg:name: otherDistinguishingCharacteristicOfTheExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has other distinguishing characteristic of the expression
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a characteristic other than content type, language of expression, or date of expression.
rdf:Description.skos:scopeNote: It serves to differentiate an expression from another expression of the same work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitLabel: other distinguishing characteristic of the expression
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A characteristic other than content type, language of expression, or date of expression.
rdf:Description.skos:scopeNote: Elle sert à distinguer une expression d’une autre expression de la même œuvre.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: Caractéristique autre que le type de contenu, la langue de l’expression ou la date de l’expression.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitLabel: otra característica distintiva de la expresión
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: Una característica diferente del tipo de contenido, lengua de expresión o fecha de expresión.

rdf:Description.reg:name: panelist
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has panelist
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a performer contributing to an expression of a work by participating in a program (often broadcast) where topics are discussed, usually with participation of experts in fields related to the discussion.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A performer contributing to an expression of a work by participating in a program (often broadcast) where topics are discussed, usually with participation of experts in fields related to the discussion.

Interprète contribuant à une expression d’une œuvre en participant à une émission (souvent diffusée) où des sujets sont discutés, habituellement avec la participation d’experts dans les domaines reliés à la discussion.

Un intérprete que contribuye a una expresión de una obra participando en un programa (a menudo una transmisión) en el cual los temas se discuten generalmente con la participación de expertos en esos temas.

rdf:Description.reg:name: paraphrasedAsExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is paraphrased as (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that restates the content of the source work in a different form.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that restates the content of the source work in a different form.
Expression d’une œuvre qui reprend le contenu de l’œuvre source sous une formulation différente.
Una expresión de una obra que replantea el contenido de una obra fuente en una forma diferente.

rdf:Description.reg:name: paraphraseOfExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is paraphrase of (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work used as the basis for a paraphrase, i.e., a restating of the content of the source work in a different form.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work used as the basis for a paraphrase, i.e., a restating of the content of the source work in a different form.
Expression d’une œuvre servant de base à une paraphrase, c’est-à-dire une reprise du contenu de l’œuvre source sous une formulation différente.
Una expresión de una obra utilizada como base para una paráfrasis, i. e., replanteamiento del contenido de la obra fuente en una forma diferente.

rdf:Description.reg:name: parodiedAsExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is parodied as (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that imitates the style or content of the source work for comic effect.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that imitates the style or content of the source work for comic effect.
Expression d’une œuvre qui imite le style ou le contenu de l’œuvre source dans le but de produire un effet comique.
Una expresión de una obra que imita el estilo o contenido de la obra fuente para crear un efecto cómico.

rdf:Description.reg:name: parodyOfExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is parody of (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work whose style or content is imitated for comic effect.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work whose style or content is imitated for comic effect.
Expression d’une œuvre dont le style ou le contenu est imité dans le but de produire un effet comique.
Una expresión de una obra cuyo estilo o contenido es imitado para crear un efecto cómico.

rdf:Description.reg:name: performer
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has performer
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a person, family, or corporate body contributing to an expression of a work by performing music, acting, dancing, speaking, etc., often in a musical or dramatic presentation, etc.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A person, family, or corporate body contributing to an expression of a work by performing music, acting, dancing, speaking, etc., often in a musical or dramatic presentation, etc.

Personne, famille ou collectivité contribuant à une expression d’une œuvre en exécutant de la musique, en jouant, en dansant, en parlant, etc. souvent dans une représentation musicale ou dramatique, etc.
Una persona, familia o entidad corporativa que contribuye a una expresión de una obra interpretando música, actuando, danzando, hablando, etc., generalmente en una producción musical o teatral, etc.

rdf:Description.reg:name: photographerExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has photographer (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an illustrator contributing to an expression of a work by providing supplementary photographic content to the original work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An illustrator contributing to an expression of a work by providing supplementary photographic content to the original work.

rdf:Description.reg:name: placeAndDateOfCapture
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has place and date of capture
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to the place and date associated with the capture (i.e., recording, filming, etc.) of the content of a resource.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: The place and date associated with the capture (i.e., recording, filming, etc.) of the content of a resource.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitLabel: lieu et date de la captation
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: Le lieu et la date associés à la captation (c’est-à-dire l’enregistrement, le tournage, etc.) du contenu de la ressource.
El lugar y fecha asociados con la captura (i.e., grabación, filmación, etc.) del contenido de un recurso.

rdf:Description.reg:name: placeOfCapture
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has place of capture
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to the place associated with the capture (i.e., recording, filming, etc.) of the content of a resource.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: The place associated with the capture (i.e., recording, filming, etc.) of the content of a resource.
Le lieu associé à la captation (c’est-à-dire l’enregistrement, le tournage, etc.) du contenu d’une ressource.
El lugar asociado con la captura (i.e, grabación, filmación, etc.) del contenido del recurso.

rdf:Description.reg:name: precededByExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is preceded by (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that precedes (e.g., is earlier in time or before in narrative) the succeeding expression.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that precedes (e.g., is earlier in time or before in narrative) the succeeding expression.
Expression d’une œuvre qui précède l’expression suivante (par exemple, qui lui est antérieure dans le temps ou dans un récit).
Una expresión de una obra que precede (por ej., es anterior en el tiempo o en la narración) la expresión que sigue.

rdf:Description.reg:name: presenter
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has presenter
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a person, family, or corporate body mentioned in an "X presents&quot: credit for moving image materials and who is probably associated with production, finance, or distribution in some way.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A person, family, or corporate body mentioned in an "X presents&quot: credit for moving image materials and who is probably associated with production, finance, or distribution in some way.

Personne, famille ou collectivité mentionnée dans un générique d’images animées sous la forme « X présente » et qui est probablement associée d’une façon quelconque à la production, au financement ou à la distribution.

Un intérprete que contribuye a una expresión de una obra dirigiendo un programa (a menudo una transmisión) que incluye otros invitados,intérpretes, etc., ( por ej., presentadores de programas de debates).

rdf:Description.reg:name: productionDesigner
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has production designer
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a person, family, or corporate body responsible for designing the overall visual appearance of a moving image production.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A person, family, or corporate body responsible for designing the overall visual appearance of a moving image production.
Personne, famille ou collectivité responsable de concevoir l’aspect visuel global d’une production d’images animées.
Una persona, familia o entidad corporativa responsable del diseño de la apariencia visual general de una producción de una imagen en movimiento.

rdf:Description.reg:name: projectionOfCartographicContent
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has projection of cartographic content
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to the method or system used to represent the surface of the earth or of a celestial sphere on a plane.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: The method or system used to represent the surface of the Earth or of a celestial sphere on a plane.
La méthode ou le système utilisé pour représenter la surface de la Terre ou d’une sphère céleste sur un plan.
El medio o sistema utilizado para representar la superficie de la Tierra o de una esfera celeste en un plano.

rdf:Description.reg:name: puppeteer
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has puppeteer
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a performer contributing to an expression of a work by manipulating, controlling, or directing puppets or marionettes in a moving image production or a musical or dramatic presentation or entertainment.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A performer contributing to an expression of a work by manipulating, controlling, or directing puppets or marionettes in a moving image production or a musical or dramatic presentation or entertainment.

Interprète contribuant à une expression d’une œuvre en manipulant, en contrôlant ou en dirigeant des marionnettes dans une production d’images animées ou bien dans une représentation ou un spectacle musical ou dramatique.

Un intérprete que contribuye a una expresión de una obra manipulando, controlando o dirigiendo títeres o marionetas en una producción de imágenes en movimiento o producción teatral, musical o un espectáculo.

rdf:Description.reg:name: radioAdaptationOfExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is radio adaptation of (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that has been adapted as a radio program.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that has been adapted as a radio program.
Expression d’une œuvre qui a été adaptée en émission de radio.
Una expresión de una obra que fue adaptada como programa de radio.

rdf:Description.reg:name: radioProgramMusicExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is radio program music (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a musical work that is used in a radio program.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a musical work that is used in a radio program.
Expression d’une œuvre musicale utilisée dans une émission de radio.
Una expresión de una obra musical que es usada en un programa radiofónico.

rdf:Description.reg:name: radioScriptBasedOnExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is radio script based on (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that has been adapted as the script for a radio program.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that has been adapted as the script for a radio program.
Expression d’une œuvre qui a été adaptée en script d’émission de radio.
Una expresión de una obra que fue adaptada como el guión de un programa de radio.

rdf:Description.reg:name: radioScriptExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is radio script (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that provides the text for a radio program.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that provides the text for a radio program.
Expression d’une œuvre qui fournit le texte d’une émission de radio.
Una expresión de una obra que proporciona el texto para un programa de radio.

rdf:Description.reg:name: recordingEngineer
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has recording engineer
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a person, family, or corporate body contributing to an expression of a work by supervising the technical aspects of a sound or video recording session.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A person, family, or corporate body contributing to an expression of a work by supervising the technical aspects of a sound or video recording session.
Personne, famille ou collectivité contribuant à une expression d’une œuvre en supervisant les aspects techniques d’une séance d’enregistrement sonore ou vidéo.
Una persona, familia o entidad corporativa que contribuye a una expresión de una obra supervisando los aspectos técnicos de una sesión de grabación de sonido o video.

rdf:Description.reg:name: recordist
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has recordist
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a person, family, or corporate body contributing to an expression of a work by using a recording device to capture sound and/or video during a recording session, including field recordings of natural sounds, folkloric events, music, etc.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A person, family, or corporate body contributing to an expression of a work by using a recording device to capture sound and/or video during a recording session, including field recordings of natural sounds, folkloric events, music, etc.

Personne, famille ou collectivité contribuant à une expression d’une œuvre en utilisant un appareil d’enregistrement pour capter le son et/ou la vidéo durant une séance d’enregistrement, y compris les enregistrements de terrain de sons naturels, de prestations folkloriques, de musique, etc.

Una persona, familia o entidad corporativa que contribuye a una expresión de una obra utilizando un mecanismo de grabación para capturar sonido y/o video durante una sesión de grabación, incluyendo grabación de sonidos naturales, eventos folclóricos, música, etc.

rdf:Description.reg:name: relatedExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has related expression
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression, represented by an identifier, an authorized access point, or a description, that is related to the expression being described (e.g., a revised version, a translation).
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression, represented by an identifier, an authorized access point, or a description, that is related to the expression being described (e.g., a revised version, a translation).
Expression associée à la ressource décrite (par exemple, version révisée, traduction).

Una expresión, representada por un identificador, un punto de acceso autorizado o una descripción, que está relacionada con la expresión que está siendo descrita (p.ej., una versión revisada, una traducción).

rdf:Description.reg:name: remadeAsExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is remade as (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a new motion picture, radio program, television program, or video based on an earlier work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a new motion picture, radio program, television program, or video based on an earlier work.
Expression d’un nouveau film, d’une nouvelle émission de radio, d’une nouvelle émission de télévision ou d’une nouvelle vidéo basée sur une œuvre antérieure.
Una expresión de una película cinematográfica, programa radial, programa de televisión o video nuevo basada en una obra anterior.

rdf:Description.reg:name: remakeOfExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is remake of (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work used as the basis for a new motion picture, radio program, television program, or video.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work used as the basis for a new motion picture, radio program, television program, or video.
Expression d’une œuvre servant de base à un nouveau film, une nouvelle émission de radio, une nouvelle émission de télévision ou une nouvelle vidéo.
Una expresión de una obra utilizada como base para una nueva película cinematográfica, programa de radio, televisión o video.

rdf:Description.reg:name: replacedByExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is replaced by (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a later work used in place of the earlier expression, usually because the later work contains updated or new information that makes the earlier expression obsolete.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a later work used in place of the earlier expression, usually because the later work contains updated or new information that makes the earlier expression obsolete.

Expression d’une œuvre ultérieure utilisée à la place d’une expression antérieure, généralement parce que l’œuvre ultérieure contient de l’information nouvelle ou mise à jour qui rend l’expression antérieure obsolète.

Una expresión de una obra anterior cuyo contenido ha sido reemplazado por una expresión posterior, generalmente porque la obra posterior contiene información actualizada o nueva que hace obsoleta la expresión anterior.

rdf:Description.reg:name: replacedInPartByExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is replaced in part by (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a later work used in part in place of the earlier expression usually because the later work contains updated or new information that makes part of the earlier expression obsolete.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a later work used in part in place of the earlier expression usually because the later work contains updated or new information that makes part of the earlier expression obsolete.

Expression d’une œuvre ultérieure utilisée en partie à la place d’une expression antérieure, généralement parce que l’œuvre ultérieure contient de l’information nouvelle ou mise à jour qui rend une partie de l’expression antérieure obsolète.

Una expresión de una obra anterior cuyo contenido ha sido reemplazado parcialmente por una expresión posterior, generalmente porque la obra posterior contiene información actualizada o nueva que hace obsoleta la expresión anterior.

rdf:Description.reg:name: replacementInPartOfExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is replacement in part of (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of an earlier work whose content has been partially replaced by a later expression, usually because the later work contains updated or new information that makes the earlier expression obsolete.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of an earlier work whose content has been partially replaced by a later expression, usually because the later work contains updated or new information that makes the earlier expression obsolete.

Expression d’une œuvre antérieure dont le contenu a été partiellement remplacé par une expression ultérieure, généralement parce que l’œuvre ultérieure contient de l’information nouvelle ou mise à jour qui rend l’expression antérieure obsolète.

Una expresión de una obra anterior cuyo contenido ha sido reemplazado parcialmente por una expresión posterior, generalmente porque la obra posterior contiene información actualizada o nueva que hace obsoleta la expresión anterior.

rdf:Description.reg:name: replacementOfExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is replacement of (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of an earlier work whose content has been replaced by a later expression, usually because the later work contains updated or new information that makes the earlier expression obsolete.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of an earlier work whose content has been replaced by a later expression, usually because the later work contains updated or new information that makes the earlier expression obsolete.

Expression d’une œuvre antérieure dont le contenu a été remplacé par une expression ultérieure, généralement parce que l’œuvre ultérieure contient de l’information nouvelle ou mise à jour qui rend l’expression antérieure obsolète.

Una expresión de una obra anterior cuyo contenido ha sido reemplazado por una expresión posterior, generalmente porque la obra posterior contiene información actualizada o nueva que hace obsoleta la expresión anterior.

rdf:Description.reg:name: restorationistExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has restorationist (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a person, family, or corporate body who contributes to an expression of a work by restoring and/or combining earlier expressions, which may be damaged or fragmentary, to create a new expression.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A person, family, or corporate body who contributes to an expression of a work by restoring and/or combining earlier expressions, which may be damaged or fragmentary, to create a new expression.

rdf:Description.reg:name: reviewedInExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is reviewed in (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates a expression to a work that contains a brief evaluation of the described expression.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work that contains a brief evaluation of the described expression.
Expression d’une œuvre qui contient une brève évaluation de l’expression décrite.
Una obra que contiene una evaluación breve de la expresión descrita.

rdf:Description.reg:name: revisedAs
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is revised as
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that has been updated, corrected, or expanded.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that has been updated, corrected, or expanded.
Expression d’une œuvre qui a été mise à jour, corrigée ou augmentée.
Una expresión de una obra que fue actualizada, corregida o ampliada.

rdf:Description.reg:name: revisionOf
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is revision of
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work used as the basis for an updated, corrected, or expanded version.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work used as the basis for an updated, corrected, or expanded version.
Expression d’une œuvre servant de base à une version mise à jour, corrigée ou augmentée.
Una expresión de una obra utilizada como base para una versión actualizada, corregida o ampliada.

rdf:Description.reg:name: scale
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has scale
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to the ratio of the dimensions of an image or three-dimensional form contained or embodied in a resource to the dimensions of the thing it represents.
rdf:Description.skos:scopeNote: Scale can apply to horizontal, vertical, angular, and/or other measurements represented in the resource.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: The ratio of the dimensions of an image or three-dimensional form contained or embodied in a resource to the dimensions of the thing it represents.
Le rapport entre les dimensions d’une image ou d’une forme tridimensionnelle, contenue ou matérialisée dans une ressource, et les dimensions de l’entité qu’elle représente.
La proporción de las dimensiones de una imagen o forma tridimensional incluida o incorporada en un recurso con las dimensiones de la entidad que representa.

rdf:Description.reg:name: scaleOfStillImageOrThreeDimensionalForm
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has scale of still image or three-dimensional form
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to the ratio of the dimensions of a still image or three-dimensional form contained or embodied in a resource to the dimensions of the thing it represents.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitLabel: scale of still image or three-dimensional form
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: The ratio of the dimensions of a still image or three-dimensional form contained or embodied in a resource to the dimensions of the thing it represents.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitLabel: échelle d’une image fixe ou d’une forme tridimensionnelle
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: Le rapport entre les dimensions d’une image fixe ou d’une forme tridimensionnelle, contenue ou matérialisée dans une ressource, et les dimensions de l’entité qu’elle représente.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitLabel: escala de una imagen fija o una forma tridimensional
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: La proporción de las dimensiones de una imagen fija o forma tridimensional que está contenida o incorporada en un recurso con las dimensiones de la entidad que representa.

rdf:Description.reg:name: screenplayBasedOnExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is screenplay based on (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that has been adapted as the screenplay for a motion picture, television program, or video.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that has been adapted as the screenplay for a motion picture, television program, or video.
Expression d’une œuvre qui a été adaptée en scénario pour un film, une émission de télévision ou une vidéo.
Una expresión de una obra que fue adaptada como guión para una película cinematográfica, programa de televisión o vídeo.

rdf:Description.reg:name: screenplayExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is screenplay (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that provides the text for a motion picture, television program or video.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that provides the text for a motion picture, television program or video.
Expression d’une œuvre qui fournit le texte d’un film, d’une émission de télévision ou d’une vidéo.
Una expresión de una obra que proporciona el texto para una película cinematográfica, programa de televisión o video.

rdf:Description.reg:name: screenplayForExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is screenplay for (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work such as a motion picture, television program, or video, that uses the text of the work as a screenplay.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work such as a motion picture, television program, or video, that uses the text of the work as a screenplay.
Expression d’une œuvre telle qu’un film, une émission de télévision ou une vidéo qui utilise le texte de l’œuvre comme scénario.
Una expresión de una obra tal como una película cinematográfica, programa de televisión o video, que utiliza el texto de la obra como un guión cinematográfico.

rdf:Description.reg:name: screenplayForMotionPictureExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is screenplay for motion picture (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that uses the text as a screenplay for a motion picture.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that uses the text as a screenplay for a motion picture.
Expression d’une œuvre qui utilise le texte comme scénario d’un film.
Una expresión de una obra que utiliza el texto como un guión para una película cinematográfica.

rdf:Description.reg:name: screenplayForTelevisionProgramExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is screenplay for television program (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that uses the text as a screenplay for a television program.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that uses the text as a screenplay for a television program.
Expression d’une œuvre qui utilise le texte comme scénario d’une émission de télévision.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitLabel: guión para el programa de televisión (expresión)
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: Una expresión de una obra que utiliza el texto como un guión para un programa de televisión.

rdf:Description.reg:name: screenplayForVideoExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is screenplay for video (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that uses the text as a screenplay for a video.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that uses the text as a screenplay for a video.
Expression d’une œuvre qui utilise le texte comme scénario d’une vidéo.
Una expresión de una obra que utiliza el texto como un guión para un video.

rdf:Description.reg:name: script
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has script
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a set of characters and/or symbols used to express the written language content of a resource.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A set of characters and/or symbols used to express the written language content of a resource.
Ensemble de caractères et/ou de symboles utilisé pour exprimer le contenu linguistique écrit d’une ressource.
Un conjunto de caracteres y/o símbolos utilizados para expresar en lengua escrita el contenido de un recurso.

rdf:Description.reg:name: scriptForRadioProgramExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is script for radio program (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that uses the text of the source work as the script for a radio program.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that uses the text of the source work as the script for a radio program.
Expression d’une œuvre qui utilise le texte de l’œuvre source comme script d’une émission de radio.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitLabel: guión para el programa de radio (expresión)
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: Una expresión de una obra que utiliza el texto de la obra fuente como el guión para un programa radiofónico.

rdf:Description.reg:name: separatedFromExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is separated from (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that spun off a part of its content to form a new expression.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that spun off a part of its content to form a new expression.
Expression d’une œuvre dont une partie du contenu a été détachée pour former une nouvelle expression.
Una expresión de una obra que se desprende de una parte de su contenido para formar una expresión nueva.

rdf:Description.reg:name: sequentialExpressionRelationship
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has sequential expression relationship with
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that is preceded by or succeeded by the expression.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that is preceded by or succeeded by the expression.
Expression d’une œuvre qui est précédée ou suivie par l’expression.
Una expresión de una obra que es precedida por o sucedida por la expresión.

rdf:Description.reg:name: setToMusicAsExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is set to music as (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a non-dramatic musical work, other than an oratorio, that uses the text of the source work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a non-dramatic musical work, other than an oratorio, that uses the text of the source work.
Expression d’une œuvre musicale non théâtrale, autre qu’un oratorio, qui utilise le texte de l’œuvre source.
Una expresión de una obra musical no dramática, diferente de un oratorio, que usa el texto de la obra fuente.

rdf:Description.reg:name: singer
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has singer
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a performer contributing to an expression of a work by using his/her/their voice, with or without instrumental accompaniment, to produce music.
rdf:Description.skos:scopeNote: A singer's performance may or may not include actual words.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A performer contributing to an expression of a work by using his/her/their voice, with or without instrumental accompaniment, to produce music.
Interprète contribuant à une expression d’une œuvre en utilisant sa voix, avec ou sans accompagnement instrumental, pour produire de la musique.
Un intérprete que contribuye a una expresión de una obra usando su voz, sus voces, con o sin acompañamiento instrumental, para producir música.

rdf:Description.reg:name: softwareDeveloper
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has software developer
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a person, family, or corporate body contributing to an expression of a work by researching, designing, implementing, or testing the software.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A person, family, or corporate body contributing to an expression of a work by researching, designing, implementing, or testing the software.
Una persona, familia o entidad corporativa que contribuye a una expresión de una obra mediante la investigación, diseño, implementación, y la realización de pruebas del software.

rdf:Description.reg:name: soundContent
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has sound content
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to the presence of sound in a resource other than one that consists primarily of recorded sound.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: The presence of sound in a resource other than one that consists primarily of recorded sound.
Le son présent dans une ressource qui n’est pas constituée principalement de son enregistré.
La presencia de sonido en un recurso, diferente al que consiste primariamente de sonido grabado.

rdf:Description.reg:name: soundDesigner
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has sound designer
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a person, family, or corporate body contributing to an expression of a work by designing and creating audio/sound components.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A person, family, or corporate body contributing to an expression of a work by designing and creating audio/sound components.
Una persona, familia o entidad corporativa que contribuye a una expresión de una obra mediante el diseño y la creación de componentes de sonido.

rdf:Description.reg:name: speaker
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has speaker
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a performer contributing to an expression of a work by speaking words, such as a lecture, speech, etc.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A performer contributing to an expression of a work by speaking words, such as a lecture, speech, etc.
Interprète contribuant à une expression d’une œuvre en énonçant des paroles, telles qu’un exposé, un discours, etc.
Un intérprete que contribuye a una expresión de una obra haciendo u ofreciendo conferencias, discursos, etc.

rdf:Description.reg:name: specialEffectsProvider
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has special effects provider
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a person, family, or corporate body contributing to an expression of a moving image or audio work by designing and creating on-set special effects (on-set mechanical effects and in-camera optical effects).
