rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A person, family, or corporate body contributing to an expression of a moving image or audio work by designing and creating on-set special effects (on-set mechanical effects and in-camera optical effects).

Personne, famille ou collectivité contribuant à une expression d’une œuvre d’images animées ou d’une œuvre audio en concevant et en créant des effets spéciaux de plateau (effets mécaniques de plateau et effets d’optique dans la caméra).

Una persona, familia o entidad corporativa que contribuye a una expresión de una imagen en movimiento u obra sonora mediante el diseño y creación de efectos especiales del set (efectos mecánicos en el set y efectos ópticos en cámara).

rdf:Description.reg:name: splitIntoExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is split into (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of one of two or more works resulting from the division of an earlier expression into separate expressions.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of one of two or more works resulting from the division of an earlier expression into separate expressions.
Expression de l’une de deux ou plusieurs œuvres résultant de la division d’une expression antérieure en expressions séparées.
Una expresión de una de dos o más obras que resulta de la división de una entidad anterior en entidades separadas.

rdf:Description.reg:name: stageDirector
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has stage director
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a person, family, or corporate body contributing to an expression of a stage work through the general management and supervision of a performance.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A person, family, or corporate body contributing to an expression of a stage work through the general management and supervision of a performance.
Personne, famille ou collectivité contribuant à une expression d’une œuvre scénique par la gestion et la supervision générales d’une prestation.
Una persona, familia o entidad corporativa que contribuye a una expresión de una obra escénica mediante la dirección y supervisión general de una interpretación.

rdf:Description.reg:name: storyteller
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has storyteller
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a performer contributing to an expression of a work by relaying a creator's original story with dramatic or theatrical interpretation.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A performer contributing to an expression of a work by relaying a creator's original story with dramatic or theatrical interpretation.
Interprète contribuant à une expression d’une œuvre en racontant l’histoire originale d’un créateur dans une interprétation dramatique ou théâtrale.
Un intérprete que contribuye a una expresión de una obra contando una historia de un creador original mediante una interpretación dramática o teatral.

rdf:Description.reg:name: subjectOfExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is subject of (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a work that is about the expression.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work that is about the expression.
Una obra que trata sobre la expresión.

rdf:Description.reg:name: succeededByExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is succeeded by (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that succeeds (e.g., later in time or after in a narrative) the preceding expression.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that succeeds (e.g., later in time or after in a narrative) the preceding expression.
Expression d’une œuvre qui succède à l’expression précédente (par exemple, qui lui est ultérieure dans le temps ou dans un récit).
Una expresión de una obra que sucede a (por ej., posterior en el tiempo o posterior en una narración) la expresión predecesora.

rdf:Description.reg:name: summarizationOfTheContent
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has summarization of the content
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an abstract, summary, synopsis, etc., of the content of a resource.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An abstract, summary, synopsis, etc., of the content of a resource.
Synthèse, résumé, synopsis, etc. du contenu d’une ressource.
Un resumen, sumario, sinopsis, etc., del contenido de un recurso.

rdf:Description.reg:name: summarizedAsExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is summarized as (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that consists of a brief recapitulation of the content of the source expression.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that consists of a brief recapitulation of the content of the source expression.
Expression d’une œuvre qui consiste en une brève récapitulation du contenu de l’expression source.
Una expresión de una obra que consiste en una recapitulación breve del contenido de la expresión fuente.

rdf:Description.reg:name: summaryOfExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is summary of (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work used as the basis for a brief recapitulation of its content.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work used as the basis for a brief recapitulation of its content.
Expression d’une œuvre servant de base à une brève récapitulation de son contenu.
Una expresión de una obra usada como base para una recapitulación breve de su contenido.

rdf:Description.reg:name: supplementaryContent
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has supplementary content
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to content (e.g., an index, a bibliography, an appendix) intended to supplement the primary content of a resource.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: Content (e.g., an index, a bibliography, an appendix) intended to supplement the primary content of a resource.
Contenu (par exemple, un index, une bibliographie, une annexe) conçu pour compléter le contenu principal d’une ressource.
Contenido (por j., un índice, una bibliografía, un apéndice) destinado a suplementar el contenido primario de un recurso.

rdf:Description.reg:name: supplementExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is supplement (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that updates or otherwise complements the predominant expression.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that updates or otherwise complements the predominant expression.
Expression d’une œuvre qui met à jour ou complète d’une autre façon l’expression prédominante.
Una expresión de una obra que actualiza o complementa la expresión principal.

rdf:Description.reg:name: supplementToExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is supplement to (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that is updated or otherwise complemented by the augmenting expression.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that is updated or otherwise complemented by the augmenting expression.
Expression d’une œuvre qui est mise à jour ou complétée d’une autre façon par l’expression augmentante.
Una expresión de una obra que es actualizada o complementada por la expresión que aumenta.

rdf:Description.reg:name: surveyor
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has surveyor
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a person, family, or corporate body contributing to an expression of a cartographic work by providing measurements or dimensional relationships for the geographic area represented.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A person, family, or corporate body contributing to an expression of a cartographic work by providing measurements or dimensional relationships for the geographic area represented.
Personne, famille ou collectivité contribuant à une expression d’une œuvre cartographique en fournissant les mesures ou les relations dimensionnelles pour l’aire géographique représentée.
Una persona, familia o entidad corporativa que contribuye a una expresión de una obra cartográfica proporcionando medidas o relaciones dimensionales para el área geográfica representada.

rdf:Description.reg:name: teacher
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has teacher
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a performer contributing to an expression of a work by giving instruction or providing a demonstration.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A performer contributing to an expression of a work by giving instruction or providing a demonstration.
Interprète contribuant à une expression d’une œuvre en transmettant des connaissances par la théorie ou la pratique.
Un intérprete que contribuye a una expresión de una obra impartiendo formación o proporcionando una demostración.

rdf:Description.reg:name: televisionAdaptationOfExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is television adaptation of (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that has been adapted as a television program.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that has been adapted as a television program.
Expression d’une œuvre qui a été adaptée en émission de télévision.
Una expresión de una obra que fue adaptada como programa de televisión.

rdf:Description.reg:name: televisionProgramMusicExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is television program music (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a musical work that is used in a television program.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a musical work that is used in a television program.
Expression d’une œuvre musicale utilisée dans une émission de télévision.
Una expresión de una obra musical que es usada en un programa de televisión.

rdf:Description.reg:name: televisionScreenplayBasedOnExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is television screenplay based on (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that has been adapted as the screenplay for a television program.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that has been adapted as the screenplay for a television program.
Expression d’une œuvre qui a été adaptée en scénario pour une émission de télévision.
Una expresión de una obra que fue adaptada como guión para un programa de televisión.

rdf:Description.reg:name: televisionScreenplayExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is television screenplay (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that provides the text for a television program.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that provides the text for a television program.
Expression d’une œuvre qui fournit le texte d’une émission de télévision.
Una expresión de una obra que proporciona el texto para un programa de televisión.

rdf:Description.reg:name: transcriber
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has transcriber
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a person, family, or corporate body contributing to an expression of a work by writing down or notating unwritten or unnotated content, or by changing it from one system of notation to another.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A person, family, or corporate body contributing to an expression of a work by writing down or notating unwritten or unnotated content, or by changing it from one system of notation to another.

Personne, famille ou collectivité contribuant à une expression d’une œuvre en écrivant ou en notant un contenu auparavant non écrit ou non noté, ou bien en le transposant d’un système de notation à un autre.

Una persona, familia o entidad corporativa que contribuye a una expresión de una obra mediante la escritura o notación de contenido no escrito o no notado, o cambiando de un sistema de notación a otro.

rdf:Description.reg:name: translatedAs
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is translated as
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that translates the text of the source expression into a language different from that of the original work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that translates the text of the source expression into a language different from that of the original work.
Expression d’une œuvre qui traduit le texte de l’expression source dans une langue différente de celle de l’œuvre d’origine.
Una expresión de una obra que traduce el texto de una expresión fuente a una lengua diferente a la de la obra original.

rdf:Description.reg:name: translationOf
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is translation of
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that has been translated, i.e., the text expressed in a language different from that of the original work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that has been translated, i.e., the text expressed in a language different from that of the original work.
Expression d’une œuvre qui a été traduite, c’est-à-dire dont le texte a été exprimé dans une langue différente de celle de l’œuvre d’origine.
Una expresión de una obra que fue traducida, i.e., el texto expresado en una lengua diferente de la utilizada en la obra original.

rdf:Description.reg:name: translator
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has translator
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a person, family, or corporate body contributing to an expression of a work by expressing the linguistic content of the work in a language different from that of previous expressions of the original work.
rdf:Description.skos:scopeNote: A translator may also translate linguistic content between forms of the same language from different time periods.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A person, family, or corporate body contributing to an expression of a work by expressing the linguistic content of the work in a language different from that of previous expressions of the original work.
Personne, famille ou collectivité contribuant à une expression d’une œuvre en exprimant le texte original de l’œuvre dans une langue différente de celle de l’œuvre originale.
Una persona, familia o entidad corporativa que contribuye a una expresión de una obra expresando el contenido linguístico de la obra en una lengua diferente de las expresiones previas de la obra.

rdf:Description.reg:name: variationsBasedOnExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is variations based on (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a musical work from which melodic, thematic, or harmonic material is taken to form a discrete theme, which is repeated one or more times with subsequent modifications.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a musical work from which melodic, thematic, or harmonic material is taken to form a discrete theme, which is repeated one or more times with subsequent modifications.

Expression d’une œuvre musicale d’où est tirée de la matière mélodique, thématique ou harmonique pour former un thème distinct, qui est répété une ou plusieurs fois avec des modifications subséquentes.
Una expresión de una obra musical de la cual se toma el material melódico, temático o armónico para formar un tema separado, el cual es repetido una o más veces con modificaciones subsecuentes.

rdf:Description.reg:name: verseAdaptationOfExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is verse adaptation of (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that has been adapted as a literary composition in verse form.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that has been adapted as a literary composition in verse form.
Expression d’une œuvre qui a été adaptée sous forme de composition littéraire en vers.
Una expresión de una obra que fue adaptada como una composición literaria en forma de verso.

rdf:Description.reg:name: verticalScaleOfCartographicContent
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has vertical scale of cartographic content
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to the scale of elevation or vertical dimension of the cartographic content of a resource.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: The scale of elevation or vertical dimension of the cartographic content of a resource.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitLabel: échelle des hauteurs d’un contenu cartographique
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: L’échelle de l’élévation ou de la dimension verticale du contenu cartographique d’une ressource.
La escala de elevación o dimensión vertical del contenido cartográfico de un recurso.

rdf:Description.reg:name: videoAdaptationOfExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is video adaptation of (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that has been adapted for video.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that has been adapted for video.
Expression d’une œuvre qui a été adaptée en vidéo.
Una expresión de una obra que fue adaptada para video.

rdf:Description.reg:name: videoMusicExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is video music (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a musical work that is used in a video.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a musical work that is used in a video.
Expression d’une œuvre musicale utilisée dans une vidéo.
Una expresión de una obra musical que es usada en un video.

rdf:Description.reg:name: videoScreenplayBasedOnExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is video screenplay based on (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that has been adapted as the screenplay for a video.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that has been adapted as the screenplay for a video.
Expression d’une œuvre qui a été adaptée en scénario pour une vidéo.
Una expresión de una obra que fue adaptada como guión para un video.

rdf:Description.reg:name: videoScreenplayExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is video screenplay (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that provides the text for a video.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that provides the text for a video.
Expression d’une œuvre qui fournit le texte d’une vidéo.
Una expresión de una obra que proporciona el texto para un video.

rdf:Description.reg:name: visualEffectsProvider
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has visual effects provider
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a person, family, or corporate body contributing to an expression of a moving image work by designing and creating post-production visual effects.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A person, family, or corporate body contributing to an expression of a moving image work by designing and creating post-production visual effects.
Personne, famille ou collectivité contribuant à une expression d’une œuvre d’images animées en concevant et en créant des effets visuels en postproduction.
Una persona, familia o entidad corporativa que contribuye a una expresión de una obra de imagen en movimiento desarrollando y creando efectos visuales de post-producción.

rdf:Description.reg:name: voiceActor
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has voice actor
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an actor contributing to an expression of a work by providing the voice for characters in radio and audio productions and for animated characters in moving image works, as well as by providing voice-overs in radio and television commercials, dubbed resources, etc.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An actor contributing to an expression of a work by providing the voice for characters in radio and audio productions and for animated characters in moving image works, as well as by providing voice-overs in radio and television commercials, dubbed resources, etc.

Acteur contribuant à une expression d’une œuvre en prêtant sa voix à des personnages dans des productions radiophoniques et audio et à des personnages animés dans des œuvres d’images animées, de même qu’en prêtant sa voix hors champ dans des messages publicitaires à la radio et à la télévision, du doublage, etc.

Un actor que contribuye a una expresión de una obra proporcionando la voz de los personajes en radio y producciones de sonido y de personajes animados en obras de imágenes en movimiento, al igual que proporcionando voces sobrepuestas en comerciales de radio y televisión, recursos de doblaje, etc.

rdf:Description.reg:name: wholePartExpressionRelationship
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has whole-part expression relationship with
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression that is contained in or contains the expression.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression that is contained in or contains the expression.
Expression d’une œuvre qui est contenue dans l’expression ou la contient.
Una expresión que es incluida en, o contiene la expresión.

rdf:Description.reg:name: workExpressed
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has work expressed
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to the work realized through an expression.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: The work realized through an expression.
L’œuvre réalisée à travers une expression.
La obra realizada mediante una expresión

rdf:Description.reg:name: writerOfAddedCommentary
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has writer of added commentary
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a person, family, or corporate body contributing to an expression of a work by providing an interpretation or critical explanation of the original work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A person, family, or corporate body contributing to an expression of a work by providing an interpretation or critical explanation of the original work.
Personne, famille ou collectivité contribuant à une expression d’une œuvre en fournissant une interprétation ou une critique de l’œuvre originale.
Una persona, familia o entidad corporativa que contribuye a una expresión de una obra ofreciendo una interpretación o explicación crítica de la obra original.

rdf:Description.reg:name: writerOfAddedLyrics
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has writer of added lyrics
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a writer of words added to an expression of a musical work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A writer of words added to an expression of a musical work.
Auteur de paroles ajoutées à une expression d’une œuvre musicale.
Un autor que agrega palabras a una expresión de una obra musical.

rdf:Description.reg:name: writerOfAddedText
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has writer of added text
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a person, family, or corporate body contributing to an expression of a primarily non-textual work by providing text for the non-textual work (e.g., writing captions for photographs, descriptions of maps).
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A person, family, or corporate body contributing to an expression of a primarily non-textual work by providing text for the non-textual work (e.g., writing captions for photographs, descriptions of maps).

Personne, famille ou collectivité contribuant à une expression d’une œuvre essentiellement non textuelle en fournissant un texte pour l’œuvre non textuelle (par exemple, en écrivant des légendes pour des photographies, des descriptions de cartes géographiques).

Una persona, familia o entidad corporativa que contribuye a una expresión de una obra que no es básicamente texto ofreciendo texto para la obra no textual (por ej., titulación de fotografías, descripción de mapas).

rdf:Description.reg:name: writerOfAfterword
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has writer of afterword
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a person, family, or corporate body contributing to an expression of a work by providing an afterword to the original work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A person, family, or corporate body contributing to an expression of a work by providing an afterword to the original work.
Personne, famille ou collectivité contribuant à une expression d’une œuvre en fournissant un après-propos à l’œuvre originale.
Una persona, familia o entidad corporativa que contribuye a una expresión de una obra proporcionando un epílogo a la obra original.

rdf:Description.reg:name: writerOfForeword
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has writer of foreword
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a person, family, or corporate body contributing to an expression of a work by providing a foreword to the original work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A person, family, or corporate body contributing to an expression of a work by providing a foreword to the original work.
Una persona, familia o entidad corporativa que contribuye a una expresión de una obra proporcionando un prólogo a la obra original.

rdf:Description.reg:name: writerOfIntroduction
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has writer of introduction
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a person, family, or corporate body contributing to an expression of a work by providing an introduction to the original work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A person, family, or corporate body contributing to an expression of a work by providing an introduction to the original work.
Personne, famille ou collectivité contribuant à une expression d’une œuvre en fournissant une introduction à l’œuvre originale.
Una persona, familia o entidad corporativa que contribuye a una expresión de una obra ofreciendo una introducción a la obra original.

rdf:Description.reg:name: writerOfPostface
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has writer of postface
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a person, family, or corporate body contributing to an expression of a work by providing a postface to the original work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A person, family, or corporate body contributing to an expression of a work by providing a postface to the original work.
Personne, famille ou collectivité contribuant à une expression d’une œuvre en fournissant une postface à l’œuvre originale.
Una persona, familia o entidad corporativa que contribuye a una expresión de una obra proporcionando unas palabras finales o conclusiones al original de la obra.

rdf:Description.reg:name: writerOfPreface
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has writer of preface
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a person, family, or corporate body contributing to an expression of a work by providing a preface to the original work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A person, family, or corporate body contributing to an expression of a work by providing a preface to the original work.
Personne, famille ou collectivité contribuant à une expression d’une œuvre en fournissant une préface à l’œuvre originale.
Una persona, familia o entidad corporativa que contribuye a una expresión de una obra ofreciendo un prefacio a la obra original.

rdf:Description.reg:name: writerOfSupplementaryTextualContent
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has writer of supplementary textual content
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a person, family, or corporate body contributing to an expression of a work by providing supplementary textual content (e.g., an appendix, an introduction, a preface) to the original work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A person, family, or corporate body contributing to an expression of a work by providing supplementary textual content (e.g., an appendix, an introduction, a preface) to the original work.
Personne, famille ou collectivité contribuant à une expression d’une œuvre en fournissant du contenu textuel supplémentaire (par exemple, une introduction, une préface) à l’œuvre originale.
Una persona, familia o entidad corporativa que contribuye a una expresión de una obra ofreciendo contenido textual suplementario (por ej., una introducción, un prefacio) a la obra original.
